Reviews.Title: “What a surprise!”
Reviews.Author: Jmemory2010
Reviews.Content: My husband an I stayed here for a night while we were passing through on our way to key west. When we arrived it was a wonderful surprise that they upgraded our room to ocean front at no charge. The staff is excellent and very friendly and the happy hour is a wonderful gesture to show their appreciation to guests. The rooms are nicely decorated and very clean as well as pool area and the rest of the property. Excellent Value for the money and we will definitely be returning for a longer stay!

Reviews.Title: “The Best Thing in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: Neal B
Reviews.Content: After always finding something just a little bit cheaper but supposedly comparable and passing this one over for many trips to Daytona over the years, we finally stayed here. We will never pass it up again! Very well kept, family-atmosphere among staff, even the guests felt like family. This is the place to go if you want to feel like you are home away from home.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: shane k
Reviews.Content: My son and I stayed here in July during the Nascar races. It's an easy drive to the track. Our room was clean and had a great view of the beach and ocean. Air conditioning was good and cold. Hotel staff are helpful and friendly. The breakfast was average, most of the time we just had coffee and toast in our room. The swimming pool was nice and we could always get lounges. Down side is all the restaurants are a 5 minute drive away, not much in walking distance. The beds were worn out and bed sheets very thin. If you like to sleep in, remember to put the do not disturb sign up as they start cleaning the rooms at 9am. We would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Property!”
Reviews.Author: Aspargus
Reviews.Content: Just returned from the Bahama House, my new favorite place in Dayona Beach Fl. We are very picky about where we staybut we LOVED this place! Every thing is good from high quality sheets, free breakfast free happy hour large rooms all with ocean views we had an efficiancy which was great for our needs. This hotel is very clean in and out. Pool is nice and they let you swim at night same with hot tub.beach is jut steps away Staff were friendly and helpful. No charge to park your car in their lot they also have an garage underground we did not use this. Managment of Bahama house deserve much praise as they are doing every thing right! We will be back asap!!!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, nice staff,nice beach, pool, and free drinks...”
Reviews.Author: Sylvain D
Reviews.Content: We passed 3 days in july before a cruise on Disney Dream. We have found this hotel on Trip Advisor. First, it's clean, the staff is friendly, you can see the sea from your room or your balcony. The beach is really nice, the pool is ok, free continental breakfast and they offer you free drinks every night, what else do you want. My daughter is in a rolling chair and it was really easy to take her to the beach, the hotel is right on the corner of an entrance to the beach for the cars, so it's easy to roll on the sand with the wheelchair. We have appreciated this hotel so much that we came back two extra days after the cruise.

Reviews.Title: “Vacation from heaven!!!”
Reviews.Author: Alex R
Reviews.Content: I initially booked 5 days but once the time to leave arrived I just couldn't go so I called the front desk and extend our stay another night. I wished to stay another week but was time to go back to hell( work). Please do not get me wrong I like what I do but my family and me really got a relaxation time at the Bahama House. No one really recommended this hotel to us but since we've been in the Bahamas a couple times we wanted to try something different here at home and I just liked the the place name and people's review so we say ok?!!! Let's give it a try!!!! And guess what!!!! WE LOVE IT !!!!!! There is nothing bad I could say about this hotel. Our kids love it and we're definitely coming back next year. Just one more thing it really doesn't matter to me if have to pay some extra cash I want the Ocean Front View again.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it!”
Reviews.Author: Ryan C
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Bahama House in the first week in August. We got to the hotel around 11:30 and our room was ready! This was great news considering we just had a very long drive. My daughter noticed the cookies at check in and helped herself. The hotel has underground parking and a elevator that takes you from the parking level to your hotel floor. This made it very convienent to bring the lugguage to your room. Our room was very spacious with a kitchen. We had an ocean view. Our room was in the very front of the hotel furtherest away from the beach but the view was still great. The advantage of this front room was that we had an extra window in the front. Our balcony was very large and we loved sitting out there. The hotel is right next to a beach entrance if you want to drive your car on the beach (that is always fun). You do not need to because the hotel has a foot entrance to the beach. I did notice a strong urine odor by the entrance to the beach however. The beach was beautiful and lovely to walk on any time of day. The hotel provides sand buckets and shovels for the kids to play with. There are people that rent out beach chairs and umbrellas for 30 dollars For all day right by the hotel. There was also a food truck in front if you wanted some quick snacks. All in all we will be back to this hotel! Thanks for an awesome stay!

Reviews.Title: “Another great stay...”
Reviews.Author: Shellbell524
Reviews.Content: Another great stay at Bahama House for our family get-together. Breakfast is wonderful, beach and pool access and top it off with happy hour in the evening before dinner. Thank you for our July 2012 visit!

Reviews.Title: “Our stay was great!”
Reviews.Author: Mégane T
Reviews.Content: The hotel was amazing! It was really close of the beach and near downtown. we were kindly welcome and everyone who worked there always greeted us with a smile! Our room was clean and confortable and it was really quiet when we slept.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable”
Reviews.Author: neineiNewYork
Reviews.Content: Stayed at Bahama House. It was relaxing. Buffet breakfast was contnental--it was just ok as far as continental breakfast goes. The beach was really nice. Finally their cocktail reception was free but the drinks were really watered down.

Reviews.Title: “Recent 5 night stay at Bahama House, July 21st-26th.”
Reviews.Author: avpbanker64
Reviews.Content: Reviews on tripadvisor.com do matter, the positive reviews we read is why we decided to book our vacation at the Bahama House. Upon arrival, we experienced problems and wondered if we had actually misread the reviews, but after everything was taken care of our stay became better. Hotel was clean, well maintained. Rooms bigger than expected. Beach was clean, pretty and not crowded. Lifeguards present. Mostly families there. Several guests were lazy and left trash and towels laying around though. Continental breakfast was good. On one night, we were awakened by kids in the hallway (slamming doors and yelling), we did not know why their parents did not discipline them for this? Hotel is probably 2.5 miles+/- from Boardwalk activities. There are no restaurants within walking distance, must drive.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: tammy m
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very nice. It is about 3 or 4 mores from the pier in Daytona but a very good place for families. Quiet and peaceful. The rooms are older but have been refurbished, the are very large rooms. The only thing I can complain about is the private balcony overlooks the rooms to your right and to your left. I would definitely recommend this place for families and people wanting a quiet getaway.

Reviews.Title: “Good Beach Resort”
Reviews.Author: joycesilvers
Reviews.Content: The Bahama House was a very pleasant experience. We got an ocean view room which was very nice. The only negative thing I can think of was they never left enough wash clothes. The continental breakfast was good. They offered coffee and juice; pastries, fruit, bagels, toast, oatmeal, cereal, milk jellies, peanut butter. etc. I would definitely book this hotel again if I am in the Daytona Beach area.

Reviews.Title: “July 4th Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Catwoman5575
Reviews.Content: The staff as well as the hotel was wonderful for our stay. I loved the location as well as the kitchens in the rooms, we will be back for sure. EVERYTHING WAS EXCELLENT!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Would stay there again.”
Reviews.Author: Larry M
Reviews.Content: It was our first trip back to Daytona in 11 yrs. The Bahama House has us thinking about going back already. The staff was friendly and helpful when we needed something.The location was great,you are away from the action but close enough to get there.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay don't miss it....”
Reviews.Author: Ann W
Reviews.Content: Bahama House is a really nice, clean, friendly place and we enjoyed our stay the last week in June even with Debbie around. So next time consider Bahama House.

Reviews.Title: “Definitely Would Stay Again”
Reviews.Author: MominNH45
Reviews.Content: This was a nice hotel. Our room was clean and spacious with a nice balcony and view of the ocean. The happy hour was a nice touch. The pool and hot tub was clean and relaxing. Would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great beach stay”
Reviews.Author: are44
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for a few nights in June. The rooms were very clean and updated. Had excellent views of the ocean and nice sized kitchen in the suites. Staff was excellent and friendly. Pool was clean and never overcrowded. Overall I would definitely do it again.

Reviews.Title: “"Gem" on the Beach in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: pjhusk
Reviews.Content: My two sisters and I spent a brief, but lovely night at this convenient and quaint, family owned property. All I can say is, I sure wish we had arranged to spend more time there, but the remainder our vacation, took took us further south on this trip! Not only was our room, clean, bright and comfortable - it was spacious (separate social area), and the oceanfront view was spectacular from both rooms of the suite. We enjoyed a relaxing evening and leisurely early morning on the balcony, with the added convenience of brewing fresh coffee in our room. The Bahama House is so convenient, peaceful and pleasant - it is truly a "GEM" on Daytona Beach!

Reviews.Title: “Loved it had a great stay.”
Reviews.Author: SanDeeGirl68
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful time. There were 5 in our family that stayed and loved it the only recommendations I would give would be more access to the ice machines but would tell anyone this would be a great place to stay. I enjoyed being close to everything yet still far enough down to stay away from all the hustle and bustle so you still get to have some relaxing quiet.

Reviews.Title: “Well worth it”
Reviews.Author: Robert L
Reviews.Content: We expected a very good visit after reading all the positive reviews on TA, and were not disappointed. The staff were very nice and accommodating, the view was fantastic, the room was clean, modern and very large. The front desk clerk upgraded our room to the suite for free, which was basically the same width as other rooms, but much longer. The balcony was a very good size, and we woke up early to watch the sunrise. It was really beautiful, and so nice to have the ocean 50 steps from the hotel patio. The beds were not pillow top or anything fancy - they were standard as far as hotels go - but the pillows were very comfortable. There was also a queen size pull-out sofa, which was very firm but not horrible. My sincere Kudos to the hotel's planner. They could have played it cheap, but they actually took the time and spent the money to install a 2nd full size a/c unit in this room. This to me shows concern for the guest's comfort, and was a big, big plus in my book. Will definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel with friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: john1052
Reviews.Content: Visiting relatives in the area we picked this hotel after reading reviews on trip advisor.The rooms are clean. They have a small kitchen and a great ocean view.The staff were pleasent and helpful.Plenty of parking and stores near by.I will be back

Reviews.Title: “Going back next year!”
Reviews.Author: Traci L
Reviews.Content: This place was clean and the staff were so friendly and helpful. We stayed in the spacious king oceanview room. The view was perfect from the 3rd floor and the room was very big. We will be going back again.

Reviews.Title: “Great place on the beach”
Reviews.Author: Michelle G
Reviews.Content: We came here after spending 3 days in Orlando at Disney World. We wanted to relax before heading back north. The hotel was great. It was very clean, and the staff was wonderful. Our room had a full sized kitchen, and the deck had a nice view of the ocean. The only complaint was the furniture on the deck needed some work. It was slightly old and dingy. The service was impeccable, there was a continental breakfast everyday, and a complimentary cocktail hour in the evening. The beach was great, and all in all my family and I had a wonderful time. Thanks Bahama House, you made our time there extraordinary.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Time!!!”
Reviews.Author: cnthomas49
Reviews.Content: CCSC Blue Fins reserved rooms here for the swim meet in Port Orange,Fl, YMCA, June 2&3, 2012. I was well please with their choice. Great rooms, full kitchen, with excellent views of the beach from all rooms. Pool, hot tub, contiental breakfast, complementary happy hour, friendly staff which were very helpful. Beach was wonderful and the kids had a blast jumping and riding the waves. No restaurant or fitness center.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel on the beach and the staff were very friendly and helpful.”
Reviews.Author: Peggycapps
Reviews.Content: We stayed April 13 thru 20. Weather was perfect. Beautiful sunshine and wonderful ocean breeze. We got to see the shuttle being flown to Washington and got pictures. There were some beautiful sunrises. Can't wait to go back! Ocean temp was perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Experience!!”
Reviews.Author: nikko a
Reviews.Content: This hotel has amazing views of the ocean! The rooms are the cleanest I have ever seen hotel room. Every room has a mini kitchen, or a full kitchen. (We had the mini. A microwave and a dorm sized fridge. But the full kitchen ones have a stove and a full size fridge.) They have a happy hour which is all you can drink for an hour. (most hotels are 2 drink limit) They also said we can swim at whatever hour we want!! (most hotel pools close at 10 or 11pm) The Bahama House is the most amazing place ever! The Hilton down the street doesn't even look as nice as this place and they're atleast double the price. Stay at the Bahama House you won't regret it!! P.S. The hotel doesn't have a resturant or a fitness gym, but They have a restuart menu in the room that is down the street. They deliver until 4am! And they have a gym down the street that you have access to! =]

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Nancy M
Reviews.Content: We came to back to Daytona Beach after being away over 10 years. This time we brought 3 other couples with us (our friends/neighbors). One couple had never been to Daytona before and was a little disappointed there was no Fitness Center in the hotel. However, everyone had a great time and are looking forward to returning soon.

Reviews.Title: “Time for an update”
Reviews.Author: bull69
Reviews.Content: I have been staying here for years, the problem is they haven't changed with the times. TV is a 19" tube, kitchen has very little equipment, free breakfast is a joke unless you like bagels, apples an bananas. For the money they charge it should be alot nicer. I will be looking for a new place to stay.The only reason i gave it 5 stars was out of loyality.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect small boutique hotel”
Reviews.Author: Brenda L
Reviews.Content: My mother and I were in Daytona to visit family for a week and wanted a nice beach hotel, we definately got that and more. The daily happy hour made an impression on my mom that she will not soon forget, the rooms we're perfect - in fact there was a slight glitch with our reservation, but the staff quickly provided us a much better room than originally reserved, the staff could not of been more helpful nor more friendly. I really liked that the majority of the guest's were either families with children or mature adults - we never had to contend with loud, college aged party kids - that was a definate plus. I will definately recommend this hotel to anyone going to Daytona, and I will defiantely use this hotel again the next time I go to visit my family in Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel and value”
Reviews.Author: Speedracer61
Reviews.Content: First time in Daytona and this hotel. This was a pretty decent hotel and one that I would recommend for the cost. The negatives are not necessarily the fault of the hotel but I mention them for the sake of total honesty. Location is ok but the surrounding area did seem a bit run down with several empty businesses and even hotels nearby. Across the street is a sex shop and a tatto parlor so this area isnt neccessarily one that you get out and walk around. I think this is just an older area of Daytona Beach but the hotel is still close to many things including the convention center so I dont reflect the area too much on the hotel. First impressions were very good as the lobby is nice and clean, sevice was good and price was right. Got to the room and the room was clean but a little dated. I think the room may have had an update at one time but it was still obvioulsy an older room. There was a bit of a musty odor in the room but I think that is many times the case in an ocean front hotel, it was nothing an air freshener set on the AC unit didnt fix. Very nice ocean view and nice beach area. We didnt attend but there was a free daily happy area downstairs and a simple continental breakfast. Mattress was a bit spongy for my taste but that may appeal to some. We were there 4 nights and had no real problems. The room has a kitchenette with full size fridge which came in handy. For our purposes, and the event we were in Daytona for, this hotel meet our needs nicely. I dont hesitate recommending it despite a few flaws some, as I said, beyond the responsibility of the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “The Best in Daytona !!”
Reviews.Author: JohnRDayton_Oh
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have been coming here for over 10 years. After one night at the late "Treasure Island" We walked next door to the Bahama House and never looked back. I could go on and on about the Bahama House. There are sooo many good reasons to stay here and no reasons not to! My wife and I are very picky people and usually find something wrong with a place, but not here! All I can say is give them a try and you'll never stay anywhere else and I mean that most honestly..we've been alot of places and none measure up !! Our home away from home. Going again in a week.. "Sea" ya there. John and Dana

Reviews.Title: “great place”
Reviews.Author: cathy p
Reviews.Content: This is the best hotel I ever stayed in. My husband and I are already planning our next weekend trip. Great service and super clean.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Staff”
Reviews.Author: KansasCity_MoSusie
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just returned....first timer's for Bahama House.....The staff was wonderful...!!! Being a older hotel we were a little hesitant but once we walked through the doors we knew we were in the right place. The rooms are spacious and the balconies are wonderful. Overall the hotel is very clean. My only complaint would be that our room at times smelled of musty cigarettes....and that would be our only complaint....We will definitely go back -- as I said the location, the staff, and our overall experience was wonderful...!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to go back!”
Reviews.Author: Ive509
Reviews.Content: I booked at night's stay at The Bahama House per the great reviews listed on this site. I am very squeamish about staying at hotels, so review are a big factor in chosing a place to stay. I was not dissapointed at all. Upon arrival we were told we had been upgraded to a deluxe room which was located in the corner of the top (10th) floor. The rooms were very large and very clean. The staff was so nice and helpfull. We will definitely be coming here again!

Reviews.Title: “Last minute stop, a great choice”
Reviews.Author: badxl1200
Reviews.Content: Stopped in last minute on spring break. We had 2 families that got rooms on the 10th floor, a good choice. Overlooking the ocean and beach was fabulous. Rooms were spacious and balcony was quite nice. Continental breakfast in the mo ring was typical breads and fruit, service was friendly and everyone was polite. Pool was open24 hours as long as you weren't disturbing anyone, so hot tub in the wee hours of the morning was quite nice. I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Never disappointed!”
Reviews.Author: scrappingmama
Reviews.Content: This was not my first stay at the Bahama House and it won't be my last. This time I had the pleasure of staying all by my lonesome and it was great! Cocktails helped! The weather was AMAZING and the so were the views. As usual the staff was so friendly and welcoming. Of all the places I have stayed this is my favorite.

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: vetters1
Reviews.Content: This is a repeat visit for us. We always try to stay at the Bahama House. Their staff is friendly, the breakfast and cocktail hour are always well done!

Reviews.Title: “Exactly what I was looking for”
Reviews.Author: DannyB994
Reviews.Content: This hotel was exactly what I was looking for. It is right on the beach with ocean view rooms. The hotel is a bit older but the rooms are clean and well laid out. There was a full kitchen in the room, fridge microwave, stove top plus dishes, pots, utensils. We were only there for one night but this place would have been perfect for a week long stay. The breakfast buffet was good, standard hot and cold breakfast fare. Much more convenient than having to find and pay for a restaurant breakfast. Free parking was a plus as well. I will stay there again next time I visit Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “Great place,Book It ,see you there next time in Daytona.”
Reviews.Author: Larry G
Reviews.Content: I have been to Florida beaches many times. The Bahama House is now my house in Daytona. My room was up graded to a beach front room. Nice pool and hot tub. Road to drive on the beach right next to hotel. Hotel has beach front furniture for best sunbathing below pool area. Free Breakfast was not much but I had a full kitchen in my room. Room deck had a good area for morning coffee watching the sun come up over the roaring ocean waves. I wish there was a bar/resturant on site but many are close by. I only stayed 2 nights that was not enough. Don't try to do too much on your vacation. Chill out in one place with the family. Cook for yourself so you can save money so you can stay at the Bahama House longer.

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, clean & friendly”
Reviews.Author: 10acmel
Reviews.Content: We checked in here after finding our favorite, the Nautilus, full. We found this place offered comfort and cleanliness but with a few caveats: Uncomfortable beds & pillows. Thin sheets. Older TVs; no flat screens. Hallway in second floor smelled musty. The immediate vicinity isn't the greatest, with an adult store and tattoo parlor right across the street. I never felt endangered, but I can't say that I was entirely comfortable either. Pluses: VERY friendly staff, from housekeeping to front desk. Nice breakfast spread, included in price, staffed by friendly hostess. We had no issues with cleanliness. Family place; quiet during spring break. We'd stay here again & would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: “Great for families!”
Reviews.Author: emilyandlucas
Reviews.Content: My family and I vacationed at the Bahama House last summer and it was AWESOME! The pool area is very nice and inviting. The rooms are very roomy and spotless. The staff is very friendly and always greeted us as we came in and out, and who can forget about the cookies at the front desk!?! The view of the ocean from our balcony was breathtaking. I loved staying there and my kids on a regular basis ask if we're going back - we will be for sure!

Reviews.Title: “Bike Week”
Reviews.Author: Owen T
Reviews.Content: Had a great stay at the Bahama House during Bike Week, the rooms were very clean and the staff went overboard to make sure our group had everything we needed. I will be going back for future trips and staying at the Bahama House.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful get away”
Reviews.Author: HHNsrum
Reviews.Content: We recently visited this hotel for three days, while attending bike week 2012. The rooms are very clean and they all have very nice views of the ocean. The staff made the stay even better, they provided quick help when needed, and always greeted us with smiles. I will be a repeat customer.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay for Daytona Bike Week”
Reviews.Author: krisveil
Reviews.Content: We were extremely satisfied with our stay at Bahamas House during Bike Week. It's approx 2 miles north of Main St action and on the beach. The underground parking was nice but the gates close at night so when we rolled in late we had to park in lot. Our room had a great kitchenette and view with balcony. Continental breakfast was fair.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Beach Vacation Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Dee A
Reviews.Content: The Bahama House was the perfect beach vacation hotel! The view from my balcony was amazing, and I loved listening to the ocean while relaxing with my book. The room was spacious and very clean and comfortable. There was enough space for my entire family. And, the kitchen was great for snacks and drinks for my kids! The pool was clean and refreshing, very close and convenient to beach access. And, the Happy Hour was fun! I am definitely returning to Bahama House on my next Daytona vacation!

Reviews.Title: “A Treat on the Beach”
Reviews.Author: oceanside-Mary
Reviews.Content: Extremely clean, excellent staff, comfortable rooms, boutique hotel feel, wonderful views of the beach and ocean, hear the waves from your room. This hotel has a heated pool and a wonderful happy hour every evening at 5:30. The underground parking is a plus in Daytona Beach. This is our third time staying at the Bahama House and we will be back -- it is like a home away from home. Breakfast room is well stocked and serviced.

Reviews.Title: “Weekday at the beach”
Reviews.Author: nancy l
Reviews.Content: We spent two very nice days on the beach front. Bahama House was very clean, pool area was wonderful with heated pool and hot tub. Breakfast had nice variety of choices and happy hour was great free drinks and nice chance to meet other guests. Our room was exceptionally nice with balcony and kitchen area, and the staff was very friendly and even brought ice to the room until our ice maker kicked in. We had a great time and highly recommend this site.

Reviews.Title: “Nice with great view”
Reviews.Author: ethics1
Reviews.Content: This is a great value, $106 per night, full kitchen, balcony directly on the beach. Pool and deck very nice, chaise lounge chairs.Only negative is that mattress was a bit hard.Otherwise, would stay again

Reviews.Title: “The price was right but the weekend was cold. Brrrrrr”
Reviews.Author: ttdbythesea
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend won a drawing for a weekend at the Bahama House. The hotel is well maintained both inside and out. There is a complimentary happy hour on Friday and Saturday evening from 5:30 - 6:30 and complimentary continental breakfast in the morning from 7:30 - 9:30. The happy hour included popcorn, pretzels and peanuts, beer, wine and mixed drinks. Breakfast includes coffee, tea, OJ, bagels, toast, hot/cold cereals, bananas, apples and various pastries. We only have a few complaints - the mattresses need to be upgraded as you could feel the springs in room 809. Even though we were two rooms away from the elevator, you could hear the mechanical noise every time it moved. The grout in the foyer and bathroom floor tiles needs some bleaching and the toilet is one like you would have in a school bathroom, no tank on the back but at least it worked and was clean. The room was spacious with a small refrigerator and microwave. The view from our south side balcony was very nice and had two chairs and a small table. The weather went down to 32 on Saturday evening so we only got to enjoy the hot tub on Friday night. The pool towels were WAY too small. I guess they don't want to make them nice or people might walk off with them. All in all, we enjoyed our short stay and the good outweighed the bad. The staff was very friendly and any request we asked was granted.

Reviews.Title: “Bahama House looking dated”
Reviews.Author: ohnrn
Reviews.Content: This year we booked an ocean front efficiency and received a corner room (05). Our balcony lost the morning sun very quickly and we were pestered by small biting insects, so couldn't use the balcony as much as we liked. The pool area was overrun by Lovebugs and many of the lounge chairs around the pool are cracked or broken. The TV in our room needed to be upgraded to a larger LCD model. Housekeeping was just average. The kitchen supplies are very limited. No paring knife, corkscrew or wineglasses. We were able to borrow a corkscrew from the front desk, but I would bring my own supplies in the future. We would probably try a newer hotel that is closer to restaurants if we ever return to Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “Loved this place!”
Reviews.Author: WAtravelgrl
Reviews.Content: I'm the type of person that loves to stay in 4 star hotels when I can. I was anxious about staying at the Bahama House because it was so cheap but decided to trust all of the reviewers and go for it. I was not disappointed. I stayed in an ocean front room overlooking the pool. The room was clean and comfortable. The view was amazing. The AC worked very well. The bathroom was super clean. The staff at this hotel where always super friendly and ready to help. They also leave the pool and hot tub area open all night, as long as there are no noise complaints. This was a welcome exception to the "everything closes at 11PM rule" that we usually encounter. The pool was sparkling clean and heated perfectly for the chilly night air. Every day they have a free cocktail hour in the lobby area. They put out snacks and serve up mixed drinks. It's so unusual to get something for free these days. I'll definitely stay here any time I visit Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “Good time”
Reviews.Author: Tim C
Reviews.Content: Very nice for the price it is not a 5 star hotel, likewise you don't pay a 5 star price. Finding a hotel that accepted pets with an ocean front room was difficult. Was pleased this one allowed it. staff was nice and helpful, hotel was reasonably clean.

Reviews.Title: “I really liked this place”
Reviews.Author: GeorgiaKelly
Reviews.Content: Staff was extraordinarily friendly, room was clean and quiet, balcony had view of the beach. Decent continental breakfast and open-bar happy hour every evening. I had a very nice stay.

Reviews.Title: “OK”
Reviews.Author: tydoug1
Reviews.Content: THis is an older hotel that is run well. The rooms are larger than a traditional hotel room but is outdated and musty smelling. Staff was pleasant and helpful. Breakfast is light.

Reviews.Title: “Good Weekend Location.”
Reviews.Author: Pat34373
Reviews.Content: The room was average with two beds and kitchenette. It really needed a comfortable chair or small sofa for relaxing. Everyroom seems to have a good view of the ocean and I would say the balcony is a little larger than average. The rate included a continental breakfast, which was again, average. Since I was there in January and the temperature was in the 40's, I wasn't able to enjoy the pool area. Overall it was a good value and would consider staying there again in warmer weather for a weekend.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: modestconsumer
Reviews.Content: This hotel is clean and convenient. The staff isn't always the friendliest but you can't beat the rooms on the beach. There is a happy hour & a very modest breakfast included in the price.

Reviews.Title: “Filthy”
Reviews.Author: nrcpic
Reviews.Content: Our efficiency was absolutely filthy, old dark rugs, a horrible odor camouflaged with spray, no counter space, and just simply NOT EFFICIENT --AND in spite of their WI FI, there is virtually NO SIGNAL available for any given period, so FORGET about internet access-You have to go in the hall or down to the lobby with your lap top if you want access. But they'll tell you it's YOUR computer that's not working properly and never admit they have a cheap signal for the clients.The other clients mentioned the same internet problems, as well. OH- but the staff always smiles unseemingly unaware of the clients' frustrations. Allow me to save you the aggravations...go elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Christmas Stay”
Reviews.Author: Bellsies
Reviews.Content: We first lucked out by having fantastic weather to start the vacation. Then, we arrived a day early only to have the Bahama House offer us the fantastic deal that we recieved through expedia, without even asking! Everyone was extremely friendly all weekend - even though they had to work Christmas weekend. The room was very clean. Beds comfortable. The kitchenette was ideal and worked perfectly for us to make our own breakfast Christmas morning. The happy hour was a nice touch. Simple but nice. The hotel was a little too far from the strip to walk for dinner but a quick cab ride is all it took. Great value. We went on to a couple other places to complete our holidays but Bahama House was our favourite!!

Reviews.Title: “Love this place!”
Reviews.Author: Dottie0328
Reviews.Content: I love this hotel, it is small and inviting. The people are friendly, helpful and smile all the time. The beach view was amazing!

Reviews.Title: “Third Visit was fabulous!”
Reviews.Author: aj_18
Reviews.Content: We have now taken three total trips to the Bahama House and been very pleased with all of our visits. This was supposed to be a 2 day trip which we ended up extending to a 5 day trip because it was so nice. We stayed in the Ocean Front room with our small children and really enjoyed the view every morning and evening with them. Hotel staff was very accomdating our entire visit would definitely recommend again!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent all the way around!”
Reviews.Author: karlabeth61
Reviews.Content: We for 7 days at the Bahama House while in Daytona December 29 - Jan 5,2012. The service was excellent! We arrived one day early and they moved us from an ocean view room to an ocean front room at no extra cost for the upgrade. The room was very clean, the sheets, the bed and towels are fantastically soft and comfortable. the happy hour is a wonderful little perk. Parking lot above ground is good..we towed a trailer with our motorcycle and golf cart and there was room to turn it around and to park all four vehicles and we could see our vehicles from the room balcony. Underground parking is also available. Everything is clean from the lobby to the pool to the rooms. very satisfied with the room, service and facilities and grounds. Talked to a couple from St. Augustine, they said they stay at the Bahama House when they visit Daytona and it is their belief it is the best hotel in Daytona. We would have to agree!

Reviews.Title: “Amazing”
Reviews.Author: pamp66
Reviews.Content: The Bahama House is amazing. My family and I stayed there June 24-29 2011. It was our first time to Florida and seeing the ocean. We had so much fun. The staff was very friendly and accomodating. My husband and i are going to stay there for our 25th anniversary in 2012. Looking forward to it

Reviews.Title: “Hotel was excellent with a capital E”
Reviews.Author: Mary Ann C
Reviews.Content: My husband and I went to Daytona Beach for a mini vacation and found in the Bahama House one of the most friendly and relaxing hotel atmospheres we've ever experienced. Our 5th floor room was tastefully decorated, very clean and comfortable, and had a fantastic beach view. We will definitely return there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel !!”
Reviews.Author: harleygirl10
Reviews.Content: I have been coming to Daytona Beach on and off since the 1970's. This was the cleanest, friendliest, most relaxing hotel of any I have ever stayed in. The Underground garage was great since we had our Harley with us..Free breakfast and a great cocktail hour as well. I felt right at home there and will be back for sure !!

Reviews.Title: “Rooms for wedding party.”
Reviews.Author: Carole C
Reviews.Content: I recently reserved a block of rooms for my daughter and her attendants and our family members for the weekend of her nearby wedding. The rooms were clean, roomy and comfortable as advertised, and the free continential breakfast was plentiful and enjoyable. Since we had torrential rain and horrendous wind all weekend, we were not able to take advantage of the pool or beach, but the underground garage was a Godsend. Employees were all pleasant and helpful, and the two items I requested were provided immediately. Better weather would have been the icing on the cake.

Reviews.Title: “Our Favorite”
Reviews.Author: Mike K
Reviews.Content: The past four years my wife and I have visited the Bahama House. Prior to these visits, we did not have a loyalty to any particular local. Due to the staff and management of the Bahama House as well as its surroundings, we will continue or return visits for years to come. We are appreciative and highly recommend this locally owned hotel to all.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Jaivh
Reviews.Content: The rooms were reasonably priced but were not very clean. The walls were dusty and dirty. The hotel hasn't been updated in some time but the staff is very friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay - Recommended”
Reviews.Author: observer2005
Reviews.Content: My wife and I just finished a one week stay in a large, clean room with a full sized efficiency. All rooms have an angled view of the beach and balconies. Clean hotel. Friendly, helpful staff. Nice, spacious lobby area. Pool and hot tub are clean and well positioned. Complementary beverage each evening in the lounge. Mature clientele. Hotel is on a relatively quiet part of the beach. Not a lot of restaurant choices nearby. There is some reasonably priced, good seafood at the Charlie Horse, but you probably need a car or taxi to get there. The beach was very clean -- little or no debris. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Great, Clean, Fun and beautiful.”
Reviews.Author: IndianChief7
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 7 days and never had one issue. Friendly and efficient staff made our vacation even better. Will definitely refer to friends and family and return on our next vacations.

Reviews.Title: “OK Stay”
Reviews.Author: Ggirls
Reviews.Content: Beach and pool area was enjoyable. Room was OK. Staff was polite. Not much to choose from in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Excellant Hotel”
Reviews.Author: kristina m
Reviews.Content: What a beautiful hotel very clean, big and great price. The front desk and all employees were great, very accomdateing and polite. Wll stay again for next baseball tournament or mini vacation. Beautiful view of the ocean.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Vacation”
Reviews.Author: casualtravelerUSA
Reviews.Content: The hotel was great. The staff went out of their way to make us feel comfortable. The rooms were clean!! The grounds were well maintained. The pool area was next to perfect. Breakfast was very welcome. Happy Hour was an unexpected delight.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Bahama House in Dantona Beach Shores”
Reviews.Author: smithwc
Reviews.Content: This hotel was wonderful. I loved it. I normally go to a fancy resort. They are very busy and I'm not crazy about crowded places. The Bahama House was perfect for someone wanting to relax without all of the crowds. It was extremely clean, all service personnel from the front desk to the maintence men and the housekeeping ladies were so nice and went out of their way to make our stay as comfortable as possible. The continental breakfast was ok...lots of pastries and breads..but the happy hour was a very special touch. Nice pool and hot tub. There was even a place on the other side of the pool, facing the ocean, for sunbathing. I loved it. I will definately go back. Great view of ocean from room with a nice balcony. Could not ask for more...Great FIND!!! Also free parking at hotel with underground parking available with elevator.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful relaxing carefree stay, about as nice as I have had anywhere.”
Reviews.Author: Dennydmc
Reviews.Content: The staff was very welcoming and efficient. Everyone seemed to go out of their way to make you feel comfortable. I have been in the resort business do over 30 years. This stay was how you would like them all to be. THANKS TO THE ENTIRE STAFF D. McCauley Inverness FL

Reviews.Title: “Great even in the cold weather.”
Reviews.Author: aj_18
Reviews.Content: We went to the Bahama House in December 2010 with my husband,his father,and his stepmother. We had ocean front side by side rooms and even with the cold weather had a wonderful time. The staff was friendly,the hotel wasn't busy,and the breakfast and cocktail hour were great. It really set a nice mood for a 2 day getaway even with the cold weather.

Reviews.Title: “First time but 100% not lost, we we'll be back”
Reviews.Author: elkaOntario
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay, I stay there with my 3 grandaughters and we have such a great time. Staff are very friendly and helpfull. We drow the car from Windsor, Ontario Canada. We left to see disney world for three days, cuple miles after my grandaughters they ask my can we go back to Daytona Beach? I sad yes " We'll back next year again." Thank you so much to made our vacation beautifull.

Reviews.Title: “Anniversary @ Daytona Beach”
Reviews.Author: Richard W
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Bahama House on Daytona Beach for several years, we love the staff, the rooms are clean and well maintained. Beautiful beach and great views. Happy Hour and breakfasts are a plus. We will be back in November for Turkey Run.

Reviews.Title: “Were we at the same hotel as these other travelers?”
Reviews.Author: IsItFiveOClock
Reviews.Content: I'm not quite sure how this hotel rated #6 out of Daytona properties. This hotel is old, like most of Daytona. The staff was not very friendly (couldn't get suggestions on anywhere to eat, cleaning crew would not let us go out the front entrance in the middle of the afternoon). The rooms are dark and dated, bathrooms really dated, balconies small with rust all over the doors and railings, view next door is of a condemned property. The upside is that it is family oriented so not a lot of loud noise and relatively clean for its age. The property is not really within walking distance of anything. The WinnDixie (grocery store) is about 1/2 mile away and that is the closest ... no restaurants in close proximity. We had friends that stayed at the Holiday Inn which is about 1/3 mile up the beach (closer to town) and it was MUCH nicer. Would recommend spending the extra money. You can see from other reviews that we travel a lot and we're not that picky but I just can't recomment this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Well worth it”
Reviews.Author: Stephen B
Reviews.Content: When we first checked in, the staff was extremely helpful and nice. They upgraded us to a bigger room for the same price as our original room, and we even lost one of our room keys and the staff told us to not worry about it even though it should have been an extra ten dollar charge. The room was large and spacious, and the bed was extremely comfy. The pillows were a little soft but that wasn't a big deal for us. The price was a little expensive but overall the hotel was something i would definitely visit again. Breakfast was a little limited as well but there was enough for us to eat and be satisfied.

Reviews.Title: “"First time visit, but not the last!!!"”
Reviews.Author: Wanda P
Reviews.Content: We had a very nice room with great views of the beach and also could see toward the river. The continental breakast is above average and the staff were all extremely nice and helpful. Don't forget to enjoy HAPPY HOUR!

Reviews.Title: “So coming back to this lovely boutique hotel”
Reviews.Author: MissPTY
Reviews.Content: We had such a great time! The hotel was exactly what we were looking for. Super clean, great amenities, spacious room, and beachy decor (very appropriate). The staff is exceptional too. The surpassed our expectations and were always courteous and helpful. The lock on on our balcony door was acting up so we reported it to the front desk. Jane took care of reporting it right away and the maintenance team member was prompt to fix it. After hours - parking can be a bit limited (it's a boutique hotel after all), but the night front desk employee was swift in finding me a spot on the side of the building. I mentioned to a friend (who's a resident of the area) where I was staying, and he quickly commented that he always hears very good reviews about the Bahama House. Although Daytona is not usually my first beach destination in Florida, we will definitely be staying here again!

Reviews.Title: “Trip Advisor Has Never Let Us Down......Until Now!”
Reviews.Author: starchild101
Reviews.Content: Maybe it is the intense heat of the Florida sunshine. Possibly it is the free happy hour drinks from 5:30 to 6:30 pm everyday. Whatever the reason is one thing is for certain, people have been blinded by something to seriously overrate this hotel. It is always best to start with the good, so let’s start there: -Our view off of our 8th floor balcony was wonderful. -The free newspaper was very nice to read every morning on the balcony (if you were lucky you can enjoy a cup of coffee with the morning paper, that is if your maid ever leaves refills for your coffee maker). -Lobby area was very clean. -Free liquor served from a cart everyday (from 5:30 to 6:30pm), mainly well drinks and beer but hey it’s free booze! Now the not so good: -Bed was very uncomfortable, pillows had no fluff what so ever, and the bathroom towels were thicker than the blankets (which isn’t saying much). -The eight-floor hallway reeked like b.o. or stinky feet (take you pick, either way it stunk). -There were light switches in the room that didn’t work, lights that just didn’t work at all, and a night-light in the bathroom that didn’t work. -If you need to charge your phone, ipod, ect in your room good luck getting the plug to stay in the outlet, they fall right out since the outlets are so old and worn out. -Maid service was horrific, never picked up any garbage unless it was directly in the garbage can. Never left coffee refills for our coffee maker, in fact we left the coffee pot open with my coffee cup in it, and left the empty coffee wrapper sticking up in all our empty cans (that she never picked up) and she still didn’t get the clue (see the photo I attached). It got comical after a while, we would put things (like an empty 12 pack carton) on purpose smack dab in the middle of the floor just to see if she would pick it up, and guess what we would get back to our room and it would still be sitting there right in the middle of the floor. Worst maid service ever! -Sand was all over the chairs on the balcony when we got there (we were on the eighth floor – i.e. they were never cleaned off from the last guests). -No ice machines, need ice you have to go to the front desk and wait for some eye rolling kid to get you some ice. -Pool area is very small, to get to the beach you get to enjoy the mutant grasshoppers as you walk through the five feet high weeds and grass. You think they could trim it back a little so people can get to the beach. -Location is not the greatest, no restaurants, just a tattoo place and adult emporium across the street. -By the end of the day the garbage by the pool is often often overflowing on the deck. We have always relied on trip advisor in the past, but this time it really let us down. In fact I really wanted to give this place a good rating from day 1, we are not picky people, this place just got worse and worse as our stay continued. I just do not understand how this property gets such good reviews. I will not stay here ever again!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: LShadows81
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice hotel. Very clean & the staff were very friendly. I spent a week in Florida, & before I checked into this hotel, my family & I were in Orlando at a hotel that was very disappointing. We were glad to be in this one. Wish we could've stayed longer than 3 days. Definitely would recommend this hotel to anyone traveling to Daytona Beach. Two thumbs up!!!

Reviews.Title: “We loved the accomodations and staff!!! We will be going back”
Reviews.Author: Syl51
Reviews.Content: We were there on our way to Orlando. We were extremely happy with our stay. We will definately stay there next time if our travels take us that way again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay and we will definitely be back”
Reviews.Author: esther1000
Reviews.Content: Room a bit dated but excellent value, extremely clean and well maintained hotel. Cheerful, caring and helpful staff. Happy hour very pleasant and continental breakfast was very convenient. Outstanding location on a quieter section of beach with several lifeguards. Many rooms with a stunning ocean view.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: lockeygirl1
Reviews.Content: My husband and 3 children spent 4 nights in Bahama House while on vacation. The hotel was clean and presentable. Staff was accommodating and nice. Rooms were comfortable and clean. The pool has an easy, quick access to the beach. The biggest negatives were the free breakfast (very disappointing) and the location. Although it was beachfront, its location was in a more questionable neighborhood. We had to drive several miles for most meals (although there is a decent pizza place across the street). The pool was clean, yet small and typically very crowded. I would stay at Bahama House again on my next Daytona stay, but will likely shop around to see if I can find something closer to restaurants and in a safer area.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Place for Vacation”
Reviews.Author: kb42010
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed here after we had a terrible experience at the hotel we were supposed to be staying at. This hotel was seriously our life saver.. The employees were so friendly and willing to help you with anything you needed. The ocean view was beautiful. The whole atmosphere of the hotel was wonderful and was definately somewhere I'd stay at again, and I would recommend this place to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great ocean views”
Reviews.Author: Sherry506
Reviews.Content: We were totally surprised to walk into our room to discover we had a beautiful ocean view! Our room was on the side so we had not expected this. We could also look down on the pool. Bahama House had an elegant lobby and a friendly staff. The hotel had a laid back atmosphere that put us at ease. It is right on the beach so it was easy to take walks along the beach and enjoy the ocean. The kitchenette in the room was an added bonus. We are not great restaurant goers so we were able to have simple meals in our room. The continental breakfast offered by the hotel was very good. This is a great hotel for families and for anyone who enjoys a relaxing atmosphere.

Reviews.Title: “4th of July weekend”
Reviews.Author: Mspineaple
Reviews.Content: This hotel was not a disappointment !! The lobby is beautiful..HAPPY HOUR WAS GREAT... FREE BEER, Wine & Bahama MaMas... Ms Sandy is the best...She was the front desk clerk and she did happy hour!!!:) We booked an ocean view room (wanted ocean front) but our view was spectacular )... For us the hotel had better quality than alot of the top dollar hotels... The only down side is no room service but the continental breakfast is nice! The staff is great & friendly... We will be back!!!:)

Reviews.Title: “NICE STAY”
Reviews.Author: deecatt
Reviews.Content: We just got back today....we had a great time.......the forth floor view was great and our housekeeper was so good at cleanning I WANT TO TAKE HER HOME WITH ME.breakfast was just enough to eat before going out in the sun for a day. I only wish that they had music at the pool.....just a radio or something in the background.....not over whelming just some beach music.

Reviews.Title: “Decent place to lay your head”
Reviews.Author: SyracuseGirl1981
Reviews.Content: We got an oceanfront room w/a balcony. I had no idea April was "love-bug" season. I hate bugs and you couldn't even sit outside on the balcony withouth being bombarded with these things. It seemed like these bugs went away once the wind finally picked up around 2pm. We made the best out of it anyway. We realize it's not the Bahama House's fault these bugs were mating EVERYWHERE. As for our room, it was pretty dingy but we had just came from a brand new resort in Orlando so we were spoiled. The sheets looked clean so that's all I really cared about. We also had a DISGUSTINGLY STINKY baseball team in the room next to us who never shut their door and our entire hallway smelled like dirty armpits. Again, not the Bahama House's fault but it put a damper on our trip. The continental bfast was decent. We never tried the free cocktails... we brought our own liquor and tervis tumblers. We also didn't bother cooking either. There is a Subway restaurant a couple miles south (as well as 2 grocery stores and several gas stations). I heard the diner across the street was really good but we were only there couple nights so we never made it. The beach was very wide and had a "jeep convention" one day...thousands of jeeps rode by one morning. It was pretty cool. They say you cannot have any alcohol on the beach but we had beer w/coozies and drinks in a tumbler and noone ever bothered us. I'm sure if you are a high school crew on spring break being idiots, they might say something to you. The front desk woman at the Bahama house is super nice! (Her name is escaping me). The pier is about a mile down, but honestly-- that area is so rundown and nasty, it was nice being a little farther down. It made for a good walk and great location to go for a run. I would definitely stay here again but I would not come in April (or whenever "love bug" season happens to be).

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: GatlinburgOwner
Reviews.Content: The Staff is friendly and knowdlegable. The underground parking is a plus. The morniing breakfast buffet is eccellent as is the afternoon free drinks and appitizers. A bit far to walk to the Main Street pier or Main Street bars and restuarents. A great value.

Reviews.Title: “A true gem”
Reviews.Author: csgraham29
Reviews.Content: I was recently in town for a job interview and the company had me stay at The Bahama House. I wasn't expecting much, but I came away very impressed. The room was probably the cleanest I have ever seen during my travels. It was also spacious and met all of my needs. The view of the ocean was fabulous. The cocktail hour was free and offered a chance to sit and just watch the waves roll onto the beach. The only downside about my experience was being on the side of the hotel. While I had a relatively unobstructed view of the ocean, the balcony was exposed to street noise and the air conditioner, which drowned out any wave noise. Overall, awesome experience, especially since I got the job.

Reviews.Title: “We Loved it!!”
Reviews.Author: Rhonda5754805
Reviews.Content: We stayed two nights with 2 girls age 22 that also loved it. Free breakfast included and free happy hour with snacks. The bloody marys were sooooo good. There is a Winn Dixie grocery store down the street if you want to buy groceries for the refrig and microwave in room. We went to Jacks restaurant on the river which was fun atmosphere eating outside. The staff was nice and pool and hot tub great. It was great having ocean front and watching the cars drive by on the sand.

Reviews.Title: “What a view”
Reviews.Author: tungate3
Reviews.Content: The Bahama House is a great place. I loved the beach and hottub,and the view was breathtaking, pool could have been a little bigger. But overall a great stay. Thanks to the Bahama House staff for a great vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Love this place - Our choice when visiting Daytona.”
Reviews.Author: HollywoodJohn
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have been going to Daytona since we got married 6 years ago. We stayed at the Bahama House on our first trip and we loved it. For some stupid reason, our second trip to Daytona we stayed at a different hotel and completely regretted it. This time, we made sure we went back to the Bahama House and we were so happy we did. We can't say enough nice things about this hotel. They do everything right. The staff is so nice and accomodating, the rooms are nice, the views are great, and on and on. Really, I can't say anything bad. You get a continental breakfast and a happy hour which are both great. Another thing that can easily slip between the cracks on these reviews is all the little things this hotel does. Since this is a beach hotel, people walk in and out with wet feet so you would expect the floors to get wet and messy. Not here, as soon as someone walks through the staff immediately mops up the floors. There are lot of other little things too like fast elevators, convenient underground parking, a nice pool, dry towels for the pool, nice lobby, hot tub, a secondary area below the pool area that faces the ocean with lay-out chairs, and very clean. The fact that they keep a beach hotel as clean as they do is on its own commendable. We also had a tough situation occur in which my wife lost something very important. The staff was so helpful in helping to look for the object that I was completely blown away. I don't know what else to say. I wish I could say more. It was really tough to leave. Bahama House is our home whenever we travel to Daytona. Thank-you so much!

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: FloridaHoney
Reviews.Content: This place was a very pleasant surprise - when you walk into the lobby, you are struck by how clean it looks and smells. Even with people coming in from the beach, somehow they keep the tile clean. The room was older, but nice and clean - and how do you beat the view of the Atlantic ocean from the balcony? They have a very complete breakfast - no cooked foods, but lots of cereals, bagels, juice, etc. And (my husband's favorite) they have fresh baked cookies at the front desk! Also a complimentary happy hour. It was definitely a great value - and we will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent in every way”
Reviews.Author: happytraveler34373
Reviews.Content: Stayed here several times. Wonderful location. Ocean front with balcony excellent view of beach, ocean, birds. Sunrise view. Beautifully decorated large room and bath. Convenient efficiency with fridge, stove and microwave. Very, very clean. Very clean and large swimming pool and spa. Cocktails excellent and provided free at happy hour, but no appetizers - except pretzels and popcorn. Breakfast - basically continental but still big variety and well served. Right on the beach front and very, very close to ocean. Can't do better and we have stayed at several in this area. Excellent restaurants within 10 minutes. Won't stay any place whenever we come.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: danimal18
Reviews.Content: Bahama House was very enjoyable. Rooms are nice and clean with ocean views. Free cocktail hour is great. Underground parking is very nice. Right on the beach with a nice pool area. Breakfast included pastries, cereal, bagels, fruit (good enough for me). Only negative was that is is a far walk to any restaurants/bars. No restaurant in the hotel too, but kitchens in the rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience!!”
Reviews.Author: dgkmom1
Reviews.Content: My adult daughter and I stayed at the Bahama House for Jeep Beach and we were so happy with our experience! We arrived early hoping to check in early but our room wasn't ready yet. The woman behind the counter was so pleasant to us and offered to keep our bags for us while we went to the beach since my Jeep did not have a top. Our room was clean and spacious and the kitchen was clean and view was great. Whenever we needed anything the response was fast and pleasant. The continental breakfast was good. This will be our new go to hotel in Daytona!!!! Great rooms, great service and a great price!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: xxxbdrockxxx
Reviews.Content: This hotel is in a great location in Daytona Beach. The lobby looked great and clean. The rooms could use a little better cleaning and some new mattresses. We didn't get to Daytona till late. The pool looked nice but didn't get to use it. It was a nice hotel and would most likely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: minivaca-lover83
Reviews.Content: This place was amazing. We had a wonderful stay. The hotel was extremely clean and very kid friendly. They have beach toys for the kids, free cocktail hour, and free breakfast. The staff was very friendly and helpful. I would recommend this place to anyone and would definitely come back and stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place”
Reviews.Author: Maliboozinit
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel for a girls weekend in one of the efficiencies. Had a full-size fridge & microwave, sink, & two-burner stove top. The room was a nice size and had a great balcony. Bathroom was roomy / water pressure & temperature were great. We were not an ocean-front room, but ocean-view and it was just the same to me. Pool was pleasantly heated, but the hot tub was a little too hot for me. Has a nice, separate, area from the pool where you could sit in their lounge chairs by the beach. They have an underground parking garage which was nice, but parking was hard to find at times. Not too far from all of Daytona's main attractions. Staff was extremely friendly!! Lobby smelled great!

Reviews.Title: “Bahama House provides bang for the bucks( and are nice people)”
Reviews.Author: GaryConnecticut33754
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed for the 4th time and found this experience as enjoyable and relaxing as the others. The staff is friendly and very helpful. Every morning the breakfast is well run with Linda, the breakfast manager making sure the coffee is hot and the items are always well-stocked. She also will fill your cooler with ice with a smile. Our room was always well-kept and cleaned promptly. We would recommend this hotel for all your trips to Daytona. It has a great location and is nearby all the Daytona attractions whithout the noise.

Reviews.Title: “love it”
Reviews.Author: shin26
Reviews.Content: The Bahama House is a great place to make ur home away from home.the hotel smells great,it's clean the staff is friendly and the guest treat u like family i wouldn't stay any where else.i would recommend this hotel to anyone that love to sleep and feel safe and clean.great size rooms,nice kitchen,pool,spa(nice and hot),toys for kids to take on beach,this hotel even have Happy Hour :) o n if u can get ocean front love it!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Far exceeded all expectations!”
Reviews.Author: yourpersonalasst1
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Bahama House for only one night, and wished we could stay an entire week. The amenities, courteous service and atmosphere were far beyond our expectations. An amazing value for a gorgeous, spacious room, luxurious feel, spectacular views of the beach and city, friendly service, and more. I wouldn't stay anywhere else and we are going back next year... or sooner if possible. Wow! Little things mean everything! Extra towels, impeccably clean, prompt attention, free cookies and a bountiful breakfast. The sunrise was fabulous on the beachfront deck with hot fresh coffee. It was home away from home and better. Thank you for the memories.

Reviews.Title: “Great Daytona Location”
Reviews.Author: OntarioFundaddy
Reviews.Content: The staff, room, and location of this hotel is awesome! The rooms are huge, clean, bright, and have great views of the ocean. The breakfast is good and convenient. The staff is cheerful and professional. I would stay here or sun viking lodge anytime in Daytona Beach and feel comfortable, and have a great time.

Reviews.Title: “Bahama House rocks!!”
Reviews.Author: DeniseB62
Reviews.Content: We arrived on Saturday march 19 for a weeks stay. Our room was ready and we were offered an upgrade for a small per day fee. The staff was very welcoming and friendly. We were in a king size suite room on the 10th floor. The room was very spacious and clean. Had a great view of the ocean, wish we were on the south side for the afternoon sun though. It was nice to have a full size refrigerator in the room. There is a light breakfast daily. Coffee, orange juice, bagels, cereal, pasteries. We stocked up on extra food. The pool area is very nice, sat beachside every day!! There is a daily happy hour, this was a nice perk. Not enough munchies though :( Overall a nice quiet hotel, heard no other noises at night. Very sad to leave. Only wish it had more around it, had to drive everywhere. The pier is a 1 1/2 mile away, more restaurants in that area.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful surprise. Great room, great value, great beach location.”
Reviews.Author: JonR72
Reviews.Content: Our first choice was one of the timeshare "resorts" in New Smyrna Beach, but it was all booked up. After checking TripAdvisor, we decided to give Bahama House a shot, and we're so glad we did. If you really need a five-star hotel, Bahama House is not what you're looking for. But if you want a great hotel, on a great beach, at a great value, Bahama House would be tough to beat. The service was top-notch. When we arrived in the room, one light had a blown light bulb and a second light blew a bulb as soon as we turned it on. We called front desk, and maintenance had both bulbs replaced in less than 10 minutes, which involved two trips to the room. This also includes the time it took for us to ask his advice on a local restaurant. After leaving, he showed back up a third time, just a couple minutes later, with a local restaurant guide that included some great coupons. (The guides were free in the lobby, but he went and grabbed one then brought it to us without us even asking. And his recommendation, Tokyo, was also a great experience.) Front desk was always pleasant and eager to please. The room had an awesome view of the ocean and beach, and we were not in one of the "beach front rooms". Our room was off to the side, but the layout of the hotel still allowed the room to have a great view, even from the bed. Sitting out on our balcony, listening to the waves, was such a wonderful and relaxing experience. The room included a stove top, microwave, toaster, and refrigerator, so we didn't have to eat out for every meal. There is a Winn Dixie grocery store just a block away, and a Publix not much farther. Each night's stay includes a continental breakfast with a good selection of non-cooked items. (We would prefer to have some cooked items, even if it is a waffle iron where we can make our own waffles.) Someone was there to keep it stocked and clean up the small messes. Each night's stay also includes a complimentary cocktail hour in the evening, with beer, wine, select mixed drinks, non alcoholic drinks and sodas, fresh popped popcorn, pretzels, and peanuts. This was a very pleasant surprise. The pool is heated and very well maintained. They also have a whirlpool that I enjoyed for an hour or so each night. And I almost forgot, the hotel has underground parking in the basement. We never had problems finding a parking spot with quick access to the elevators. We could go straight from the room to the car without going through the lobby, and the car was never hot from setting out in the sun. All in all, the Bahama House was the best of four places we stayed during our week in Florida (and one of the other three was a timeshare resort). I definitely recommend Bahama House to anyone going to Daytona Beach. That area of Daytona was very peaceful and calm in the middle of Spring Break, so it is ideal for family vacations.

Reviews.Title: “A Nice Surprise!”
Reviews.Author: 2ENVYus
Reviews.Content: Having never stayed at this particular hotel before, we were unsure of what to expect... From beginning to end, our overall experience was quite nice! Check in was simple & quick. The room key looks like a little USB connection, never saw that before and it worked great. We had a room on the 2nd floor - when the elevator opened to our floor we were overwhelmed by the wonderful smell of homemade spaghetti sauce!! We thought, "WHAT?!" Yes, indeed! There was a family enjoying their stay with a scrumptious meal that probably fed them for their entire stay. This is all because the rooms had a FULL kitchen and so did ours. Our room was oceanfront and very roomy. Having queen beds was a plus. The room, kitchen area, and bathroom was all very clean! Water pressure in the shower, which is a big deal for us was to die for! The best in all the hotels we've stayed at in a long time! The Manager's Reception was crowded but understandable - full cans of beer and a good pour on cocktail drinks. Our 17 yr. old son entertained guests by playing the grand piano in the hotel lobby. Only two minor drawbacks - parking is limited surrounding the hotel (but there is underground parking) and pool/beach towels- get them early or better yet, bring your own!! May we recommend Racing's North Turn Restaurant, Daytona Beach Shores/Ponce Inlet area, for your dining pleasure!! Overall, a very pleasant stay during Spring Break 2011!

Reviews.Title: “surprised”
Reviews.Author: fatmaher
Reviews.Content: I thought this hotel was gonna lack in some areas,but was surprised..great room on ocean.We attended happy hour and it was great..if you can't get a great buzz during 1 hour free drinks..try rehab....if there was anything bad it was a lack of outside bar near pool....will stay again....

Reviews.Title: “Again another wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: TRAVEL9174
Reviews.Content: My husband and I went back to the Bahama House to spend a weekend. If you are looking place to stay in Daytona, this is it. We will continue to go back!

Reviews.Title: “okay hotel - not the best location”
Reviews.Author: FloridaGatortravels
Reviews.Content: this could be more an observation on Daytona Beach in general, but where this hotel was located seemed like a dump. it's directly across the street from a tattoo parlour and adult emporium. the hotel does not have room service or a restaurant, although the staff was friendly, the room was clean (and freezing!) and there was a complimentary continental breakfast. also, even though I was on the 9th floor, the constant noise from the motorcycles outside made it's way into my room. even if it hadn't been so chilly, I couldn't have opened my doors and listened to the ocean. but again, that probably goes for any place along Daytona Beach. this is not a leisurly vacation destination by any stretch

Reviews.Title: “The best hotel room we have experienced.”
Reviews.Author: bobrbf
Reviews.Content: Luci & I stayed at this hotel on FEB. 22, 23, & 24TH OF February, 2011. In all of our travels including Hawaii and much of the mainland, this is the most enjoyable stay we have experienced. The room overlooked the beach so the view was perfect. We were the most pleased with the layout of the room itself. It was very spacious. Everything was so convenient for the guest. All of the staff made our stay terrific. I cannot wait for our next trip to Daytona Beach, I already have a hotel. If i can think of one thing that is a negative. I will have to amend this later. Absolutely nothing comes to mind.

Reviews.Title: “Will definitely stay here again”
Reviews.Author: msmolins
Reviews.Content: We will definitely stay here again when we come to Daytona Beach. We had a good view of the ocean, with easy access to the beach. The pool and hot tub area were nice and not crowded in the evening. We REALLY enjoyed the complimentary happy hour and the breakfast was good as well, with a decent variety of food. The coffee could be better, though. The rooms were comfortable, with a kitchenette that included a stovetop, dishes, pots, and utensils. The grocery store is a short walk down the road, so we ate in a few nights. The staff was very friendly and we got a gift bag upon check in. We enjoyed our stay!

Reviews.Title: “A fun, laid back place to stay on the beach”
Reviews.Author: coffeecupkat
Reviews.Content: I've stayed @ Bahama House three times in the past two years. The staff goes over and above to be friendly and helpful. The WiFi access is fast with great signal (was able to watch Hulu with no problem). The room was clean and spacious, with a great view of the beach. Loved the evening Cocktail Hour, as well!

Reviews.Title: “Didn't want to leave.”
Reviews.Author: TV48
Reviews.Content: Clean, comfortable, competatively priced and right on the beach-you won't regret staying at the Bahama House. Nice pool and hot tub. Competent and cordial staff. The rooms are large and pleasant Nightly happy hour is a plus. It's good to have a car to drive to some of the desirable restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Great excape to the beach”
Reviews.Author: oceanside-Mary
Reviews.Content: This is the best place to stay on Daytona Beach. Clean, friendly, affordable accomodations. extra perks include free continental breakfast, mid morning cookies, and nightly happy hour. Free underground parking is a plus. Excellent ocean view with private balconies and the waves lulled us to sleep. Friendly staff make this a home away from home, and many people come here each year for extended stays.

Reviews.Title: “Bahama House offers the best of everything from sunrise to sunset.”
Reviews.Author: Kathy48858
Reviews.Content: From the minute you register to the moment you leave, your needs are meant with utmost courtesy and a smile. Your trip will leave you wanting to return year after year.

Reviews.Title: “Best VALUE for your $$!!”
Reviews.Author: nikkizimmerman
Reviews.Content: This hotel has the largest rooms I have ever stayed in! CLEAN CLEAN CLEAN!!! I was there for work but I can't wait to come back with my family. If you want a true "seaside" family vacation this is it. From the staff to the clean rooms I can't say enough good things about this hotel...!!

Reviews.Title: “This place was great.”
Reviews.Author: nikkimz
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay. Great value, friendly staff.

Reviews.Title: “We were here on business but coming back to stay for pleasure!!!”
Reviews.Author: maggiemay1964
Reviews.Content: I organize hotel accomidations for a corporation in Daytona Beach Florida. I work closely with Janice Griffin the Sales Manager at the Bahama House. I send probably 10 to 15 people there a month for either a 2 or 3 night stay. The guests I send rave about the location (directly on the beach, with private balconies and spectular ocean views) the accomodations (full kitchen, oceanfront pool, jacuzzi, free hi speed internet access and great underground parking). The hotel itself is immaculate as are the rooms and the outside swimming area. All the people I send say that they will definetly come back with their familys for a relaxing family vacation. Thank you to the wonderful staff at the Bahama House.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful”
Reviews.Author: rick195351253
Reviews.Content: Wow! Great Staff, Great accomodations! Clean Uderground Parking! Full liquor bar Happy hour and snacks! Great free breakfast! Free trolley passes1 Wonderful! Free wireless access!! Stay here...You will not be disappinted...Did I mention the great staff! Do not miss this place! Best in daytona!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful sunrise and beach view”
Reviews.Author: snehagandhi
Reviews.Content: We went there looking at different reviews and loved the hotel. Staff was friendly.... since the weather was not wat is expected from florida,we spent time in hot tub. Hotel staff is very friendly ... everything around was clean... The ocean front room had wonderful view of sunrise on the beach... the hotel does not offer complimentary shuttle to airport and may that is something that could be added... other than tat one could not have asked for more :)

Reviews.Title: “Affordable class”
Reviews.Author: Travellinggolfers10
Reviews.Content: Bahama House is a tallish, yet compact building on the famous beach that has a small hotel feel with friendly, obliging staff and smiles all the time. The rooms are large and superbly decorated and furnished. Many have balconies overlooking the sea. An ample free breakfast , free drinks happy hour from 5.30pm, free wi-fi access, free cookies at the reception and free parking are brilliant extras. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Not going back”
Reviews.Author: wtraveller2289
Reviews.Content: I have no idea how this hotel gets #1 rating. My husband and I travel a lot and have never stayed in a hotel of such terrible quality. We paid $131 a night and I was shocked when I walked into the room. The bedspread was old and smelling badly. The blankets were stained and old. The towels were very old, thin, dirty and smelled badly (I don't know what detergent they use but it smells horrible). After using them once they looked like rags. I checked the pillows … they were also stained and whatever was inside, moved constantly making our rest impossible. The safe in our room didn’t work – I put the key in and couldn’t get it out. The staff said that they needed to replace the lock. The bathroom cabinet was broken; the front panel sticking out. The tile floor in the traffic area, especially in the bathroom was dirty, the grout was almost black. There was nothing clean or comfortable. There are plantation shutters in the hospitality/breakfast room but they are all shut and the room is very dark and uninviting. When I asked why they keep them closed blocking the beautiful ocean view, the answer was that the light bothers the staff at the front desk. The staff (except for one lady) is wearing unflattering and outdated men's shirts. After we left Bahama House our next stop was HYATT Regency Orlando Int’l Airport. The price was the same $131 but the room and bathroom were a masterpiece of luxury. The owners of Bahama House should take a tour to other hotels to see what's out there. This was my first and last stay at Bahama House. Not for $131 a night and not for what was offered. This hotel needs major renovation. Would not recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel for the Money”
Reviews.Author: mankind_8
Reviews.Content: Me, my wife and another couple just came from staying at the Bahama House for two nights. The staff was exremely friendly.
