The rooms were large and comfortable with an excellent view of the Ocean and the Intercoastal. The location was excellent. A very nice Continental Breakfast came with the stay. Also, we have never stayed at a Hotel that gave a free Happy Hour. We were going to stay at a more upscale Hotel in April, but after staying at the Bahama House, we will be coming back here instead.

Reviews.Title: “How to make your Daytona Beach stay terrific”
Reviews.Author: PatVanLaBroquerie
Reviews.Content: The hotel was clean, easy to find, good parking and good location right on the beach. The pool and hot tub were excellent. Met some great people at the free "Cocktail Hour" gatherings. The staff were excellent - very friendly, super efficient and willing to go the extra mile to make their guests happy. I will highly recommend to anyone planning to visit Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “The service couldn't have been better, people very freindly and accomidating”
Reviews.Author: LeeAnn55
Reviews.Content: We traveled with my elderly parents and they granted our request for ajoining rooms. This is my 2nd stay at the Bahama house and I will stay more and recommended place tho other people. My daughter lives in daytona so we will be back. Loved happy hour and breakfast. LeeAnn Miller

Reviews.Title: “Nice place for the family”
Reviews.Author: TRAVEL9174
Reviews.Content: Rooms needs some updating but clean, staff was nice, good place for parents with young children to vacation. Beach area was quite. I would go back.

Reviews.Title: “The best little quaint hotel ever!”
Reviews.Author: cherylvu
Reviews.Content: We loved this hotel and have nothing but good things to say about it! The staff are all very nice and welcoming. Our room was giant and we had a front row view of the ocean. The nightly reception was such a nice touch and a great way to meet fellow travelers. Cookies in the morning also hit the spot. When we return to Daytona we will definitely be staying at Bahama House again.

Reviews.Title: “Average Hotel, Caters towards people over 65”
Reviews.Author: SunshineSeeker71
Reviews.Content: . This is an average hotel. The nicest quality is that it is right on the beach. The hot-tub and pool were ok. Pool was clean and seemed to be heated. If you stay here, make sure you get an Ocean FRONT room. Looks like they are only about $30 more per night. The ocean view rooms are on the side, and you can barely see a sliver of the ocean. I wish they would of stressed that when we booked. The lobby is very small, only room for about 20 people to sit. During most of the day and evening, the lobby was packed. Since our room was just so-so, and we couldn't get the internet in the room, and we had a very small tv- we really didn't want to sit our room. It seemed like the same group of adults were down there every evening, and that they all knew each other. We were happy that after 8pm, most people left the lobby, and we were able to sit down there and watch tv and surf the web with our laptops. We didn't bother with happy hour either. They offer free drinks between 5:30-6:30 because there were just so many people. Most of the guests were in there 60's-70's-80's. It seemed that they all knew each other and were having a great time. If you are under 60, I would suggest you look into some other hotels, unless you don't plan to really stay in the room and are just looking for a place to sleep. This place isn't close to shops, restaurants, or any of the hot-spots that Daytona Beach has to offer. We were bored silly when at the hotel, so at least that motivated us to go out and explore Daytona. We did have a few problems with our room at first, the staff took care of the problems when we told them.

Reviews.Title: “Great beach view with nice staff, but not cozy, plush, charming...”
Reviews.Author: pabey
Reviews.Content: Service desk was great Maintenance to the room was OK. Bathtub was not clean, bed sheets and towels are overused. Fans and A/C vents were dusty. Some of the countertop had stains. Location is good, specially a step to the beach. Best: is the beach view and being able to just walk to it. I'm not sure if I would recommend to a friend, but I would stay again looking forward for some updates in the rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Its like my second home”
Reviews.Author: rebelwithaclue16001
Reviews.Content: I sometimes forget this is a hotel. It is an all around great place to stay. Included breakfast and happy hour...at a super price...just another plus. Great pool size, jacuzzi, plenty of chairs, tables.... The staff are very courteous. Seeing the same staff from year to year says volumes about the overall quality of the Bahama House, not only toward guests but staff as well. Each year I stay, I end up extending my visit!! OH ya....its right on the beach!!

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: cathstultz
Reviews.Content: The front desk staff was super friendly and worked with us for our late arrival. We got a great water front view and the room was much larger than expected. The room was super clean. We loved having a large fridge for our use. I am so use to staying at places that have ice machines, I walked down the hall to search for one. Of course, there was ice in the freezer. It was a wonderful place to stay at and I would book another reservation again.

Reviews.Title: “Did I stay at the same hotel as all of you?”
Reviews.Author: D-Family-05
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews on this hotel and decided to stay here. I booked the room over the phone (the lady was super nice) for 5 nights. The night I checked in - I went down the street and booked the Hilton Oceanfront resort for the remainder of my stay and never looked back at the Bahama House. The room at the Bahama was dingy and musty smelling. We asked for a roll-a-way and the man who brought it up to us was dirty looking and VERY unfriendly - to the point that we were an inconvenience to him. I would have to say that the continental breakfast was nice and so was the lady attending it. The view from our balcony was wonderful, but in the end, I guess you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: “Nice and quiet -Good Value”
Reviews.Author: Vanderneucker
Reviews.Content: We had an oceanview kitchenette on the 10th floor. The room was quiet, large, clean and had a balcony with chairs. The beds were comfortable and the air conditioner was more than adequate. Continental breakfast and a happy hour are included in the rate. They also have freshly baked cookies all day. There was a small pool and hot tub that overlooked the ocean. We walked the beach each morning and were very comfortable at this hotel. They do charge an extra dollar per day if you want to use the in-room safe. This was the only thing that we thought should be included. We noticed that several couples were there celebrating their anniversaries. It was a clean, comfortable nice place that we would return to.

Reviews.Title: “A Wonderful Experience”
Reviews.Author: Jeepjunkie
Reviews.Content: The staff couldn't get any better. They were very accomadating..We even decided to stay an extra night. The room was clean and well kept. Having a mini kitchen with a nice size refridgerator was definiatly a plus. It was nice to have a snack and cold beverage on an ocean front balcony. There may not have been a restaurant in the hotel, but they put on a lovely continental breakfast. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Beyond expectations”
Reviews.Author: gems4u
Reviews.Content: Husband and I for a needed get away . Never been on east coast of fl. and did not know what to expect. It was apparently their slow time and not alot of guests there. For us it was great. Hotel was so much more than we even expected. From our check-in to check out with the breakfast and happy hour in between we were delighted. The staff really made you feel welcome. We are planning our next trip now.

Reviews.Title: “As Good as Advertised”
Reviews.Author: tigerinatlanta
Reviews.Content: Our family stayed at the Bahama House from Sept 5th until Sep 9th, so we were there during part of the Labor Day Weekend and during the part of the "slow season". Mediocre: Pool and Hot tub are just that. Pro's: 1)Rooms are nice and clean. Kitchen is equipped nicely with marble counter-tops, modern flat stove top, a few dish essentials, sink, microwave and small refrigerator. 2) Continental Breakfast & Complimentary Happy Hour & Free Cookies baked thru out the day are a nice touch. 3)Staff is efficient - We asked for a Crib for our newborn and it was in the room upon arrival. Anything we asked for we received promptly if we didnt already have it. The breakfast staff is on top of things and constantly replenishing. 4)This place is quaint, comfortable and quiet. 5)We needed to do laundry, and fortunately for us we were located right next to the laundry room. Cons: WiFi was not very stable. I work in IT, so I could troubleshoot that the signal effectively enough to recommend not staying in one of the corner rooms if WiFi is important to you. Yes the Adult Stores across the street are an eyesore, but actually Daytona Beach Shores is a pretty nice area- just that one little strip is run down. We didnt mind the location and still traveled to Parks, Inlet Harbor, Ocean Deck , and Aunt Catfish's for dinner. We will definitely be staying here again, and look forward to returning.

Reviews.Title: “Summer, Part Deux...”
Reviews.Author: scottygator94
Reviews.Content: My wife and I, with our two boogie-board fanatic sons (ages 8 & 6), stayed at this hotel on Daytona Beach (yes, ON the beach) on Sept. 18-20. The hotel is conveniently located far enough away from the usual Daytona Beach Boardwalk attractions to not get the loud partying college-aged nonsense, but close enough to drive and be there within 10 minutes. There is an underground parking garage underneath the hotel, which allows your vehicle to avoid the sun and ever-present beach sand while enjoying your stay. However, the garage is cramped, so be careful while driving out of it...once, we had to make a 3-point turn just to exit. When we checked in, we were quickly attended by the desk manager while the flat-screen TV entertained our sons with the Florida-Tennessee matchup. We were given an ocean-view room on the 9th floor, complete with 2 queen beds and a kitchenette. The room was very clean, especially the bathroom, which is not a common thing for a hotel directly on the beach. The refrigerator was spacious (lots of room for beer!!), but the ice-maker did not work, and there were no ice machines anywhere near our room. I had to go to the lobby and request ice, but no one minded at all, and the young gentleman that filled my cooler was very friendly about it...if there had been beer already in it, I would have given him one! Our room also had a small balcony, which gave two adults enough room to sit comfortably. Although the smell of cigarette smoke was pervasive from the adjoining balconies, the room did not smell of smoke at all. With the southeastern exposure, it was delightful to sit on the balcony before 7AM with my cup of coffee (brewed in-room), read the local Daytona newspaper (delivered outside the room every morning), and watch the sun come up with the sound of the surf below. Quite the idyllic setting! Also to be enjoyed are a decent-sized pool and jacuzzi (I liked the water temp, my wife thought it was too hot). It can't be stated enough that this hotel is directly on Daytona Beach...just walk out of your room, catch the elevator down to the lobby, walk out the back door and around the pool, and you are literally wading into the Atlantic Ocean! Next to the hotel is the entrance for cars to drive on the beach (if you're not used to this, beware!! Don't put your chairs, umbrellas, etc., in the middle of the car lanes!! It gets REALLY fun when the tide comes in...), but "Speed Limit:10MPH" signs are posted in close proximity. We never had an issue with a "cars vs. kids" moment...I was more concerned about the 9th-floor balcony railing than the on-the-beach traffic. There are many nearby restaurants for whatever food you crave: seafood, Italian, American cuisine, bar & grill, etc. There are also two supermarkets just south of the hotel (Winn-Dixie and Publix). The Boardwalk area, less than ten minutes north, offers some arcades, a pier (closed at night, apparently), taffy and ice-cream shops, and t-shirt souvenier markets. Salty Dog and Maui Nix surf shops are down that way, too. We chose to eat at Racing's North Turn on Daytona Beach Shores (near the southern end of the island, close to the Ponce Inlet Lighthouse)...can't say that we were impressed, but that will be another review. There are also three quality mini-golf places south of the hotel (toward the lighthouse): Congo River (closest, but most expensive), Hawaiian Falls (2 courses, and a $3 re-play rate!), and Pirate's Island Adventure (didn't even call this one). My two mini-golf enthusiasts both enjoyed the experience at Hawaiian Falls. There were minor issues with the room, but they didn't take anything away from the convenience or cleanliness of the hotel, or the friendliness of the staff. 1.) There was not much water pressure in the shower, so to feel completely sand-off-me clean, it was a good idea to use the cold water shower by the beach before going back to your room. 2.) The hotel offers a free continental breakfast, including all cold items (bagels, croissants, cereals, fruit). The fruit was not very fresh, the coffee was pretty weak, and the orange juice was slightly sour. The kids loved the cereal and the Sweet Sixteen powdered white donuts, though! 3.) There is a daily Happy Hour between 5:30-6:30, but the service is apparently so slow that my wife and I never got to partake. I stood in line on Saturday afternoon for five minutes, and the line hardly moved. 4.) The parking garage is pretty awkward to navigate with a mini-van. 5.) From the 9th-floor balcony on the south side, one can see the rooftops of the adjacent motels, one of which looked closed except for one door that remained open the entire time we were next to it...for all we know, a family of squatters could have been living there...there were NO vehicles in the parking lot of this place. One final note: when we got in the swagger wagon to depart for a family night out on Sunday, we realized that our car battery was dead (the interior lights were left on when we unpacked the evening before). Not only did the staff find jumper cables for us, they even used the hotel's own truck to charge our battery, and THEN let us take the cables with us for the evening in case we need another charge somewhere later! It's the little things. We will be back to this place. The waves were great (as opposed to Gulf Coast beaches), the location was perfect, and the price was right!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: SweetCaroline079
Reviews.Content: This is a lovely hotel to stay at. Everyone is extremely pleasant and helpful. The beach location is great and everything is well maintained. Unfortunately the area seems to be going downhill. Possibly due to the economy. Across the street from the hotel is an "adult store".

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location & accommodations”
Reviews.Author: TheAdmiralPuntaGorda
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for one night on business. The Bahama House is an excellent choice directly on the beach with a very nice pool. Rooms all have balconies facing the ocean. Each room is recently refurbished with a tropical decor. All rooms contain a fridge, 2-burner cooktop, microwave and complimentary internet access. Daily complimentary continental breakfast and happy-hour. Staff is very professional and friendly. We'd stay here again in a heartbeat and plan to return for more than one night. Free parking, too!

Reviews.Title: “very enjoyable”
Reviews.Author: HartfordTravelbug
Reviews.Content: The Bahama House was recommended by a friend. I was not disappointed. The hotel is 15 minutes away from the airport. Staff was friendly and very helpful. We had a ocean view room with a kitchen. The room was clean and comfortable. The continental breaksfast was ok and the happy hour was nice. WiFi worked fine.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Beachside Hotel”
Reviews.Author: racer70
Reviews.Content: My wife and young daughter stayed at the Bahama House August 31 thru Sept. 2, 2010. We chose this hotel based on the great reviews on Trip Advisor and were not disappointed. The hotel room, lobby and grounds are very clean and its staff are friendly and helpful. The underground parking garage is also very convenient for those in & out trips. We stayed on the 4th floor and were quite satisfied. Our room was very clean and brightly colored. It had 2 full size beds and was equipped with a full size refrigerator, microwave oven and a small stove top with a sink and basic cups, plates, silverware etc. The bathroom was clean, of average size and the water pressure was very good. The beds were not firm, but were reasonably comfortable. The air conditioner worked extremely well and in fact, it got so cold we had to turn it off for a period of time. The room had a small balcony looking at the ocean from an angle and I believe this is called an "ocean view" room. The free WiFi internet worked well and without problems. The TV was a 27" regular style TV and had a variety of cable and local channels. The pool area was very nice, clean and well kept. There is also a small hot tub, which we didn't use but looked nice. Of course the beach is just a few steps down and you're literally right on Daytona Beach. One of the great things about the Bahama House besides the friendly staff is the "Happy Hour" everyday between 5:30 p.m.-6:30 p.m. They provide free cocktail drinks, wine, beer, pop, popcorn, peanuts, pretzels etc. to all adult hotel guests. They also provide homemade cookies at the front desk. The continental breakfast is served daily between 7:30 a.m. - 9:30 a.m. It consisted of your basic cereal, toast, bagels, donuts, muffins, fruit, yogurt, milk & juice. If you are traveling with your family or friends, I would highly recommend staying at the Bahama House and you can be assured of a safe, clean, well maintained hotel in a great location.

Reviews.Title: “Everything we wanted and needed we found here!”
Reviews.Author: beachbumtraveler73
Reviews.Content: From the moment we checked in everyone was helpful and friendly and the entire place was absolutely immaculate! There were even fresh baked cookies at the counter when we checked in. We got a terrific rate, the pool, balcony, lobby and our room was in great condition. We are extremly picky and snobby when it comes to where we stay and Bahama House met our every expectation! Restaurants and activities are nearby, you're right on the beach and all kinds of watersports are available right outside your hotel door. The kids loved it too! There's also a happy hour with snacks and free alcoholic drinks and soda for the kiddos. You won't be disappointed. The only thing to improve would be the continental breakfast (which is included in your room rate).

Reviews.Title: “Perfect stay as usual”
Reviews.Author: ihop116
Reviews.Content: We had our yearly family reunion, service was great everyone is very friendly. Hotel is always keep very clean and all amenities were in working order.

Reviews.Title: “A great place for relaxing and enjoying the beach”
Reviews.Author: Bahamas85
Reviews.Content: The amenities are many, free cocktail hour was enjoyable. Pool, hot tub and beach access are great. It definitely reminds me of the Bahamas.

Reviews.Title: “Very happy”
Reviews.Author: Expedition14
Reviews.Content: I read review before booking Bahama House and approve I was correct. Internet connection was free & fast. Room was clean & spacious. Ocean view balcony is fantastic. Oceanfront pool & Jacuzzi are nice. Happy hour is awesome. We had a great time and will come back if we visit this area again. Very happy.

Reviews.Title: “Home Away From Home”
Reviews.Author: pmstew22
Reviews.Content: Bahama House is wonderful! Atmosphere is relaxed and fun! Rooms are clean and comfortable. We loved are stay and are looking to returning next year!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Saints2
Reviews.Content: Just returned from our stay and we found that this hotel was ideal for location, amenities and friendly staff. Free continental breakfast in the AM, free cocktail hour in the evening and the room was nice and clean. Also, freee covered parking is available. You cannot beat this value! We look forward to returning.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful”
Reviews.Author: aj_18
Reviews.Content: We have three young children(all 3 & under) and this hotel is an exceptional place to stay with young kids. First off the continental breakfast provided plenty of food and they kept up with refilling everything. After breakfast they put out cookies at the front desk which I have heard are great. The rooms have a small kitchen ie two burner stove, full size fridge w/freezer & ice maker,sink,toaster,and cofee maker. It even came with three pots and pans and bowls,plates,cups and utensils for four people. The table also seats four people. We were able to locate a grocery store within five minutes of the hotel and this saved a lot of money for us on meals. The hotel provides pool towels and even sand toys and pool toys for the kids. The part for the adults that my husband enjoyed was the cocktail hour as many times as you get in line you can get a drink alcohol or non alcohol...They also had popcorn,pretzels and peanuts set out. Overall we enjoyed our stay and anything we needed was provided(crib that we asked for etc). The only thing that I could "complain" about is really not that big of a deal but the bed sunk in whenever a child or adult would lay on them.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay!”
Reviews.Author: Shellbell524
Reviews.Content: We've gone every July for several years and meet up with out entire family. The rooms are immaculate and the views are wonderful from our own balcony directly facing the beach. Each morning we'd get together for the continental breakfast, which was a nice size sampling, enough to keep everyone happy. Spend our day on the beach and then we'd all meet again at the happy hour and plan our dining out. The staff are all very nice and helpful too. We look forward to our summer family trip to the Bahama House.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent experience”
Reviews.Author: win2690
Reviews.Content: very clean hotel, nice pool area and friendly staff

Reviews.Title: “Great Place To Stay”
Reviews.Author: kykid4
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Bahama House during the first week of August and enjoyed it a lot. Arrived several hours before check in but was told by the friendly staff that I could park my car, go to the beach and hang out and the room would be available in about an hour. We did and ended up staying on the beach until it was time to check-in. We had a 2 bed room that was very clean and a beautiful view of the ocean. There was a small table with a couple of chairs and small refrigerator. This came in handy because we like to go to the grocery and buy food for breakfast and lunch. The pool was refreshing when we were not on the beach and they also have happy hour from 5:30 - 6:30 that provides cocktails, beer, peanuts, pretzels and popcorn. The staff was very friendly and I will recommend the Bahama House to all friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “Always a pleasure to stay at the Bahama House!”
Reviews.Author: beachboundfamily
Reviews.Content: My family and I have been vacationing at this hotel for the past 16 years. The rooms are spacious and clean, the staff very friendly, and the location is the best. In addition, the pool is large, and the hotel provides a free continental breakfast, free fresh-baked cookies, and a free evening coctail reception for its guests. It's not a 5-star resort, but it is a great value for the money. I particularly like knowing that the hotel staff takes pride in this little gem and today is composed of the same people who were there when I stayed for the first time in early 1995, which is such a rarity. This hotel consistenly ranks in the top 3 on TripAdvisor. Need I say more? We love the Bahama House!

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: Cheers1313
Reviews.Content: My wife and I along with our teenage daughter stayed for 1 week at the Bahama House in early August and were very pleased with our choice of hotel. Rooms and hotel were clean and staff was pleasant. The front desk was especially helpful and truly there to make your stay as nice as possble.

Reviews.Title: “going down hill”
Reviews.Author: mickey97
Reviews.Content: Spend 4 days. Found that the cleanliness has change drastically.

Reviews.Title: “What a wonderful week!!!!”
Reviews.Author: cmpm1
Reviews.Content: What a nice hotel to stay in, the staff were very helpful and friendly. The room was wonderful. Breakfast was great and the happy hour was a neat surprise. Can not wait to go back again and we will. Carl and Pam Moore

Reviews.Title: “"I doubt you could get more for your money"”
Reviews.Author: ggg341
Reviews.Content: Stayed at Bahama House for 3 nights in mid July and we loved every minute of it. Pay the extra $30 or so for oceanfront as it was well worth it. Just a great value for the price. From here we went to a fancy Disney hotel which was 3 times more but not nearly 3 times better! Staff was superb and it is truly right on the beach! We are in our 50's with a teenage son and we loved the location which is away from the hustle bustle area of Daytona where we often went to eat and have fun. Nice, safe, clean area and the beach is gorgeous. My kid says every day we should have stayed at Bahama House for the entire trip! I am not saying it is The Taj Mahal but I can't remember getting more for my money!

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: sag591
Reviews.Content: Great place for the price. We arrived from Orlando at 11 am, and of course they said we couldnt check in until 3, but could use the facilities. Rooms were nice with large stove and refrig, sink and stovetop if needed. We were only there for 2 days. Breakfast was included some danishes, cereal, and toast and bagels. Happy hour was nice addition with drinks and popcorn and pretzels and nuts. WOuld stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!!!!”
Reviews.Author: joebonnie
Reviews.Content: This place was great. Great view from the room and balcony. The basement parking with elevator was very handy, and the staff was reall outstanding. Would love to stay here again. We loved it.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay with children!”
Reviews.Author: bball3
Reviews.Content: We just returned from our vacation at the Bahama House. We had a great time and it was hard to leave. The staff was very friendly and helpful. They remember your name after talking to you! We had a very nice and clean room with a kitchenette with an oceanview. My daughter oved eating her llunch and dinner out on the balcony listening to the ocean waves. My son love to spend the day boogie boarding in the ocean and digging deep sand holes. We liked the breakfast the hotel offered. One less meal for me to prepare! We also liked Happy Hour with popcorn and Shirley Temples for the kids while my husband and I sipped our adult beverages by the pool every night. We will definitely come back to the Bahama House for another stay at the beach!!

Reviews.Title: “unimaginable”
Reviews.Author: MichelleRV
Reviews.Content: I would probably not recommend this hotel to any of my friends. Yeah, it's ok, pricing is fair, soap smelled good. There was no happy medium with the a/c. The comforters on the bed are so thin, the garbage bags would have served a better purpose. House cleaning talked my 13 year old into allowing her inside while everyone else was asleep which is a major no no to me. Parties from guest located several rooms down from us commenced 2 or the 3 nights we stayed outside our door instead of their own door. Beach scenery was great, opposite side scenery was completely out of place. Breakfast????? if all ya want is fruit and cold cereal then you are probably good to go. Biggest perk was the swimming pool which is always nice and warm, lowest perk was the hot tub that was nasty, foaming and stunk.

Reviews.Title: “Once again Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: TheFergie's
Reviews.Content: Second time now, this time an Oceanfront & everything was great. Read my last review, cant say anymore really, Location great, staff friendly & helpful, rooms great. I just love Daytona Beach even though they have spoilt it with to many highrise condos it is still a great place to visit & holiday, Beach up towards Ponce Inlet & Wilbur are as good as anywhere I reckon. I love Daytona & this hotel is great.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay at the beach!”
Reviews.Author: duqorgan
Reviews.Content: From the minute you walk in, both the atmosphere and the staff are welcoming. We found the facility and our rooms to be spotlessly clean and well-maintained. A great view and easy access to the Atlantic Ocean, nice pool and whirlpool, and a feeling of laid-back, casual elegance. Parking was good, even for our large van. There is a guest laundry and even free happy hour! Only draw-backs is there was not much to walk to in the immediate area (although everything you need was a very short drive) and there could have been a few more items on the breakfast bar. Every staff member without exception was friendly and accomodating. We will absolutely return!

Reviews.Title: “An Oasis of Calm”
Reviews.Author: beezlebub
Reviews.Content: We are both locals, and we won a night at the Bahama House from a local radio promotion. I must say that we were skeptical about the hotel, but upon arrival, all our cares seemed to just melt away. The staff was so friendly and efficient. There were freshly baked cookies on the reception desk, and it seemed that the hotel was constantly being cleaned. We were shocked when we found out the hotel is over 15 years-old...It looks brand new! We checked in late in the afternoon, and we were surprised when the reception informed us of the free cocktail hour. We were even more surprised to find that it really was free! We don't have any kids, but this hotel seemed specifically tailored for families. The pool area was great, and it looked like every room had an ocean view. It is truly an oasis of calm in sometimes-wild Daytona Beach. The management of this hotel seems very dedicated in making each guest's stay a unique and enjoyable experience, and if we find ourselves in need of accommodations in Daytona Beach, we won't think twice about where to stay.

Reviews.Title: “WONDERFUL STAY”
Reviews.Author: gatorfan13
Reviews.Content: Stayed here on the advice of a friend and good reviews here. We checked in on a Friday afternoon, as my daughter had a cheer competition the next day. The room was great, and service phenomenal. We had to check out that morning, but they allowed us to return and let my daughter swim in the pool later after the competition. I highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, but room is quite filthy! yuk!”
Reviews.Author: MaOrange
Reviews.Content: We tried our best not to focus on the brown streaks under the bathroom sink and beside the bathtub, the filthy carpet, the smudges on the windows... ugh! even the pillows had a brown spot.. yuk! I understand the hotel is not new, but still... they could have done thorough cleaning to maintain it well. Once you enter the lobby, it looked nice, and has a pleasant clean smell of air fresheners.. but once you get to your room floor, you see the hallways constructed in a weird shape and signs of aging, and our room's cleanliness was just below par! Sure, the hotel provides extra amenities like free newspaper, kitchenette, free gift on check-out (bottled water!) and cookies... they also have nice toiletries -- Savannah Soaps and I thought their coffee sachets from Wolfgang Puck would be good - but it was not robust. Complaints aside however, the location is Great, just a few steps down to the beach. It's all about location, location, location. Daytona Beach is nice and fun!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay”
Reviews.Author: steven2919
Reviews.Content: This place is a must stay if your in the Daytona Beach Area. The place was very well decorated (wife thought she was in the Bahamas). Staff was extremely willing to please and would do anything to make your stay comfortable. The continental breakfast was great and the happy hour a wonderful treat. Another interesting observation, the guest all seemed to communicate and have fun together. It was again a wonderful stay and I will recommend this place to others and I will stay here again. Thanks for a wonderful time.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome, would come back and stay again”
Reviews.Author: ArkansasFan
Reviews.Content: This Hotel was great. The staff was more than friendly and it was extremely clean. Daytona Beach is a old beach town, this building is not new but is very clean. The only complaint we had was that the bathroom was small. BUT we didn't come to stay in the bathroom. VIEW -- PERFECT; COCKTAILS -- FREE; BEACH - ONLY A FEW STEPS AWAY; what more can you want? There were 4 of us and we cooked breakfast every morning and enjoyed our stay! WE WILL BE BACK BAHAMA HOUSE

Reviews.Title: “Average”
Reviews.Author: tdesign
Reviews.Content: I have to admit the hotel was clean and cozy, but the staff was not kind to travelers. They are very nice and entertaining to their regulars who stay with them every year. I felt like an outsider and it was very uncomfortable at the hotel. When I was checking in and talking & asking about the papers, the front host rudely interrupted me to talk to one of her regulars. I was very patient with her, so, later the next day, I tried to ask about their internet and she gave me a bah bah rude story about that someone in the office took it home. I was not the only one un-regular. There was another woman checking out and the front host gave a bah bah story that the bottle water that they were give out for free was lock in storage and she couldn't find the key. ("less is more" she needs to learn).

Reviews.Title: “I get why it's #1 but,...”
Reviews.Author: aliceleste
Reviews.Content: I just got back from Bahama House and I completely get why it's rated #1 in Daytona Beach - it's super clean, the staff is delightful, the location is great, the rooms are big, the price is UNbeatable, and the beach is only steps away. I just had an amazing time and consider this place to be a diamond in the rough. My boyfriend and I will be back. But, I get the negative reviews too. When the doors first open, there is an odd smell. It's like bleach, not a bad smell, but definitely hits you in the face when you walk in the door. The beds were not very comfortable, and the pillows weren't great either. And damnit both the wi fi and the elevator were slow, but seriously, that issue isn't even worth the time it took to type it out. Here's the deal though: This place is in Daytona Beach - not exactly a town known for nice things - it's a scuzzy, Florida beach town full of souvenir shops, dive bars and left-overs from bike fest. We went because it was 45 minutes from our front door in Altamonte Springs, and because the price was great. So the fact that we had an OUTSTANDING view, coupled with staff that falls over itself to please you and a clean, shiney hotel to stay at all for under $100 a night was truly delightful. Could you stay at nicer places in Daytona? Probably... but for a LOT (and I mean an unnecessarily lot, remember folks it IS Daytona...) more money. Could you stay at worse? Oh jesus christ yes. But why would you need to when Bahama House is there...? Go! It's worth it!

Reviews.Title: “Impressed”
Reviews.Author: dutchess10
Reviews.Content: What a fantastic place to stay. The cleanliness, the help, caring, love and compassion of staff are extrordinary. I've never stayed in a palce I felt more welcome. Loved the breakfast and the lady that works there, she is so sweet. I highly reccomend this hotel to other people traveling to Daytona. I know when we come back we have found our home away from home and it's called the Bahama House.

Reviews.Title: “Filthy”
Reviews.Author: Picky_traveling
Reviews.Content: My experience with this hotel is similar to the previous review by docandgrumpy. I chose this hotel for two reasons: the ranking on TripAdvisor and the price. I got a GREAT deal on Expedia. I would NEVER have paid the hotel's rate for this place. The check-in was great...the staff here is wonderfully friendly. We went up to our room, and it was disgusting. There were (what appeared to be) feces smeared all over the wall and something brown dripping down the door. The bathroom floor was gross, and the tub had a ring around it. The walls are painted a very light yellow, so you can see all the dirt all over the walls. The corners had dust an inch high in them. I told my kids to sit on the edge of the bed (“do not touch ANYTHING”) while my husband and I tried to figure out what to do. The front desk was very helpful and sent us to check out 2 other rooms. Not any better (with the exception of the feces.) Had I not paid through Expedia, I would’ve left immediately. Finally, they gave us an oceanfront room…at the cost of $50 more. It was slightly cleaner (but had dead bugs in the refrigerator). I did have a giant can of Lysol with me…so we sprayed EVERYTHING before unpacking. *Later, the manager did come by to tell us that they would not be charging us the $50 because she went to check out our first room and agreed it was “inexcusable.” The bathrooms are tiny, and very much in need of remodeling. They are old and moldy. The walls are in dire need of paint. We went to dinner and came back after dark. Wanting to change clothes, I tried to shut the curtains. The curtains don’t shut! So, anyone who might be looking can see directly into your room at night. And don’t plan to sleep past 6:30am here. That’s when the sun comes up, and with no curtains to block it out, you will be up then too! The walls are very thin, and you can hear everything going on in the rooms around you…so sleep was difficult. When we checked out, we let the manager (a different one from check-in) know about our concerns. She didn't even apologize. She handed us a bottle of water and said, "thanks for staying with us." On the positive side: the staff is super, super friendly. The happy hour is great! I’m not sure how in the world this place got a #1 rating. I don’t ask for much more in a hotel than for it to be clean. There is nothing clean or comfortable about this hotel except the happy hour.

Reviews.Title: “The hotel that has something for everyone.”
Reviews.Author: TheBigKitty
Reviews.Content: The Bahama House has something for everyone. We enjoyed the beach as well as the swimming pool/hot tub. The free continnental breakfast and happy hour were also a big hit with our family.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: KimSummerville
Reviews.Content: We had just left a 4 star resort at Universal and needed a hotel for a couple of nights on the beach. We were nervous because of a terrible experience on the beach the previous year. The Bahama House was wonderful We booked through Expedia. Our check in was quick and easy, the underground parking was great, the staff was friendly and very eager to help. Our room was clean and had plenty of space. My only complaint was that I wish I had an oceanfront room instead of a side view, but this was my fault, not the hotel's fault. We will definitely plan to stay at the Bahama House again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful place, great place for families with young kids”
Reviews.Author: LADGLD
Reviews.Content: We spent three days at the Bahama House and enjoyed every minute of it. Very friendly staff , clean rooms with kitchen, beautiful ocean view. I cannot say enough about how wonderful our stay at the Bahoma House was. It is right on the beach with a pool at hot tub. So you can play on the beach and in the ocean or sit at the pool and enjoy the view. They offer a wonderful continential breakfast and also a free cocktail hour from 5:30 to 6:30. Also, underground parking, which is a plus. If you stay at the Bahama House, you will not be dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: “The Bahama House was all it claimed to be and more.”
Reviews.Author: volfan1659
Reviews.Content: We had not been to Daytona in 30 years; what a pleasant surprise. It is always a little scary to book a hotel on-line because you can't be sure if what you see is what you will actually get. The Bahama House was all it claimed to be and more. The staff was pleasant and accomodating. Our room was very spacious, clean and with all the amenities, and the view was exquisite. We enjoyed being on a quieter part of the beach, yet close enough to restaurants and attractions to get anywhere in less than 10 minutes. We definitely plan a return visit.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: TailsTonbridge
Reviews.Content: Picked this hotel from the reviews and must say, they were spot on! This hotel is a little gem. It has everything and more. Wonderfully quiet with a beautiful outlook and how often do you find a hotel in the USA that includes breakfast? Breakfast has all you need to start your day, bagels, toast, cereal, juice, coffee. You can have as much or as litle as you wish. Happy hour we had a few cocktails, very lovely indeed. The hotel also has returning customers, which to me, says it all. We were upgraded and our room looked out across the sea, what a view, the sun came up in front of our room, beautiful. Very large room, two double beds, balcony with two chairs, tv, plenty of clothes space, chairs, table, kitchen area with large fridge/freezer, microwave, coffee maker, hob for cooking, all the crockery & utensils. All the rooms have balconies and a sea view, very rare in a hotel. The hotel is also spotlessly clean, as are the rooms, a very important feature and is right on the beach, a few steps down from the pool area and onto the sand. Then the beach, miles of clean sand in both directions. Parking is also included, which most hotels charge for, so yet another bonus. Room safe is also only $1 a day. Everything about this hotel is great. The staff could not be more friendly and helpful and as other reviewers have mentioned, it has a homely feeling, family run atmosphere, the staff really care about their guests and what they think. I was worried about how I was going to be able to check in for my flight but they did it for us while we went out for Dinner. If you are looking for a hotel that has it all plus a spot on location, then look no further, take my word for it and all the other reviewers. Stay here and it will add to your holiday and as we are, you will want to return.

Reviews.Title: “Uber Great Staff was wounderfull”
Reviews.Author: rocky61_10
Reviews.Content: Hotel was great,clean nice location great staff pool was clean ,and the rate we got unbeliveable !!!!! Even stayed an extra day got an upgrade .Costumer service at this hotel made the stay wounderful!!!!!! Would stay hear again !!!!!!!!!!!1

Reviews.Title: “Very good value.”
Reviews.Author: bmc-hartselle
Reviews.Content: My family booked this place based upon its #1 ranking on Trip Advisor. We usually stay in condos, so in that respect we were a little disappointed in our room at the Bahama House. But the longer we stayed, the more we were impressed by it. The little kitchenette was very handy. Our beds were way too soft. No HD TV in the room. Our free internet was poor, but we were on an end unit, maybe that is why. The continental breakfast was only fair. There were staff everywhere. The place was very, very clean. The pool was nice, but not that big. There were numerous chairs around the pool, plus pool towels were provided. The location was a little poor if you want to be within walking distance of the shops of Daytona Beach. They offered an incredible price for what you get. It was a very good value. All in all, it was a nice place, but we will probably try to stay closer to the shops next time.

Reviews.Title: “The Bahama House may not be the Taj Mahal, but you don't have to travel to India to fine a great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: John_B_FL
Reviews.Content: We found this hotel through several travel search engines. After reading the reviews and getting a good price, we decided to book it. First of all, the staff work hard to please you. Everyone working at this hotel greets you with a smile. The rooms are clean and offer a view of the ocean from the balcony. The distance between the property and the beach is very close, and the pool area is clean and well maintained. They have a good continental breakfast and a manager's cocktail hour with wine, beer and mixed drinks all for the price of just a tip. We live on the West Coast of Florida and visit Daytona twice a year. We have stayed at several hotels on the beach, but for the money, location and service, this was a very pleasant surprise. On our next trip to Daytona, we will definately stay at this hotel. John & Beverly B New Port Richey, FL

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Debbie127
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd time we have stayed here. The staff are friendly and the rooms are very clean. We had such a relaxing time we actually extended our stay. The staff is very eager to please and the hotel maids are very friendly and thorough. The only negative would be the Happy Hour. My husband and I are not drinkers so it would be nice if they had a nice appetizer or something instead of just popcorn. We will definately be back as this is the Hotel of our choice as we vacation in Daytona 3-4 times a year. I definately recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Our first choice on Daytona Beach.”
Reviews.Author: Pam913
Reviews.Content: I have never been disappointed with this hotel. It has a comfortable, relaxing feel to it because it is not huge and impersonal, and the staff have always been very pleasant to us. It is very convenient to have a room with a kitchen, especially when travelling with children. We always love the free continental breakfast in the morning and cookies at the front desk.

Reviews.Title: “Loved staying here”
Reviews.Author: Pit620
Reviews.Content: Although it is a bit far away from the main attractions which can be a problem when the traffic is busy, we loved staying here. The room was big and clean. We loved the little kitchen which had everything you can need to prepare a quick meal. The service was good. Definitely would recommend this hotel. One of the great things about it is free parking which is something you don't get in a lot of places.

Reviews.Title: “Great view!!”
Reviews.Author: taterbabydoll
Reviews.Content: We traveled to Daytona Beach on our way to Disney World. Neither of us had ever seen the ocean and we were looking for a hotel with beach access. Upon arriving, we found the staff friendly and helpful and were quickly checked into our room. We requested a direct ocean view room and that is exactly what we received. The view from our balcony was spectacular!! At first I was concerned about the room being across from the elevator but the room was very quiet. We were also pleased with the cleanliness of the room and bathroom. We would definitely stay again and recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: “Quiet and cozy hotel right on the beach.”
Reviews.Author: angelawestdesmoines
Reviews.Content: For us, ocean front is very important and this hotel has a number of ocean facing rooms located right on the beach. Our room was large and clean with a beautiful ocean view. Our room also included a kitchenette. Included with the room was a free breakfast brunch and evening drinks. The high point was the staff - especially Jane, Cheryl, and Sandy. They were helpful and very friendly. The trip was for our anniversary and - as my wife says - it was the best vacation we have ever had together. The only negative was that we had to eventually go home!

Reviews.Title: “Can't Wait To Go Back!!!”
Reviews.Author: TinaMarie081
Reviews.Content: Loved the hotel, excellent staff, very clean hotel room including bathroom which usually grosses me out. Nice choices for breakfast. Sand toys available to "borrow" Can't wait to go back with my entire family

Reviews.Title: “Awesome place to stay. I will be back.”
Reviews.Author: knutzen
Reviews.Content: Very friendly staff and very clean. Rooms are very big and comfortable. Kitchen even had Fiestaware for dishes! I've stayed in places where you are lucky to have two matching forks! Also has free underground parking. You can't beat the price and amenities. Thank you Bahama House!

Reviews.Title: “Pretty much all you need”
Reviews.Author: SofaKing
Reviews.Content: Our trip brought us down to Florida for the intent of seeing the Atlantis shuttle on it's final voyage. This was just a weekend getaway. We read all of the positive reviews and took the tripadvisor #1 ranking and ran with it. Here are the details: ROOM: It was a spacious kitchenette right on the beachfront. A fantastic balcony view of just about everything up and down the beachfront. The room itself is a little dated with it's decor and CRT TV. The pillows and bed left a little to be desired as well. Way too squishy and old. However, the air conditioning was very adequate and they had utensils and pans if you chose to cook. Room was quiet for the most part. We managed to get in room internet while we heard others could not. Upgrades needed in the room but it was okay generally speaking. C+ BEACHFRONT: Daytona is a pretty nice beach with the exception of all the cars that park on it, especially during the weekend. They take up all of the really soft sands spots closer to the hotel fronts and the smell of exahaust while you are trying to hang out and relax is less than appealing. If you can get past that, it's quite expansive, clean and pretty much rock free right in front of the Bahama House. B STAFF: Very pleasant at the front desk at all times. The other staff members always seemed to have a geniune smile on their face which was refreshing. A newspaper was provided each day which was great for reference. A POOL: While it's a bit small, it was well kept. There was a small jacuzzi as well. B HOUSEKEEPING: We never requested service during our stay but they seemed hard at work at all times and the general cleanliness of the place was good. I read reveiws that complain about the musty smell. People just don't realize that this is a common occurrence in warm and humid climates. You can clean all day it might not go away entirely. Lighten up. You're on a beach. B+ BATH: One sink granite vanity that was pretty spacious. Again, no frills decorating but clean. B PARKING: It was congested at times but we never had to utilize the garage parking underneath. No complaints for us but I'd imagine it could be tough during a busier time of the year. B LOCATION: This hotel is located actually in Daytona Beach Shores which is south of where the action is at. If you don't have a rental car, you might not like what have immediately around you. Not a lot of anything. You could walk to the shopping district but it would be a hike. C TIPS: Do the beachfront resturant "Ocean Deck" for casual food,drinks and live entertainment. Good party there. If you are looking for a more intimate date night, go to "Carribbean Jack's" on the riverfront for great food and atmosphere w/ live entertainment/dancing. CONCLUSION: We felt for the price that this hotel was exactly what we needed for a long weekend. If I were staying longer, I might reconsider since their is no resturant or bar to speak of even though they have a "happy hour" of free drinks. However, it's clean and comfortable and the price is right. A worthwhile place to stay on the beach as long as keep the price where it's at.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: GregPCullman_Alabama
Reviews.Content: Stayed 4 nights. Hotel is in a run down part of Daytona. This was the cleanest looking hotel in the area. Underground parking was excellent. I felt our car was secure there. Loved the included breakfast and happy hour. Room was clean and large enough. I had a few minor problems with the room when we arrived but they were taken care of quickly. They advertise free internet but don't tell you you can't get a signal in your room. You have to go down to the breakfast area to connect. Even then, with excellent signal strength, the connection was intermittent. Pool area was small but clean. Beach was clean. Not a high class hotel but I thought it was a very good value.

Reviews.Title: “My 4 days in Florida”
Reviews.Author: TomMAck
Reviews.Content: Room was spacious and very well kept. View was gorgeous. Extra parking in garage was very accessible and a great idea. Loved the free breakfast and happy hour.

Reviews.Title: “We always come back for more!”
Reviews.Author: jharri2046
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have been staying at the Bahama House about every year since they opened. They never disappoint. I find it interesting how many of the same employees I see year after year...I think that says a lot. It is a nice location, a short drive to some nice restaurants. The service is excellent, we like that they provide breakfast as well as a happy hour each day. They also offer fresh backed cookies each day, so delicious, which requires me to walk an extra mile each morning on the beach! We also like that it has underground parking. We love the Bahama House and plan to return each year as long as we are able!

Reviews.Title: “Nice for family, but no ammenities”
Reviews.Author: bootycall100
Reviews.Content: If you are going to stay in Daytona with kids, this would be a good choice. It is very clean and the price is right. It is not near anything like resturants, bars, attractions. It is also in a fairly rundown part of Daytona. We were to stay 4 nights but left after 1. We enjoy a pool bar and resturants in the hotel. We went to the Plaza in the heart of Daytona. They have a spa, pool bar and a few places to eat. They are near everything in Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Great Friendly Hotel”
Reviews.Author: JPGP
Reviews.Content: We were so pleased we decided to stop at the Bahama House on our travels around Florida from London. The staff were very friendly from the outset and access to the beach from the hotel was great. The buffet breakfast was morethan adequate with plenty of choice and the added bonus of the happy hour (which we only took of advantage of once) was something we did not expect. Rooms larget than normal and we have to agree with all the reviews, first class..

Reviews.Title: “If you're looking for a quality hotel...”
Reviews.Author: baseline87
Reviews.Content: Went to play in a USTA tournament so had several hotels to choose from that offer a discount rate to players. We chose the perfect hotel for a 2 -night stay. Staff was very friendly & helpful. 3 of us( ladies) stayed in an oceanview efficiency. The rooms were clean & comfortable, the ocean view was fantastic & you reach the beach by walking down the steps. There was a wide selection of food at the continental b'fast . The free open bar was a special treat before we headed out for dinner. The noise of the icemaker "doing its thing" at night was a negative, but there was enough positives to outweigh this. Will we return? You bet!!!

Reviews.Title: “Would stay here again in a heartbeat!”
Reviews.Author: BSU80
Reviews.Content: Having stayed at a little mom and pop place for several years in Daytona Beach, we were a little worried about staying somewhere new. Now I wish we would have made the switch earlier!! The rooms were clean and the staff was exceptionally nice and went out of their way to make sure our stay was wonderful. The continental breakfast and the daily happy hour just added to the overall experience. It is a nice balance between family friendly (we have two teenagers) and older couples wanting to enjoy the sunshine. Great experience and we look forward to heading down there next year.

Reviews.Title: “Bahama House- I'd come back again.”
Reviews.Author: 21Trish21
Reviews.Content: Great for family travel. Room had 2 comfortable queen beds and to our surpise, we were given a twin bed (likely because we were travelling with 2 kids). Our room had a kitchenette -great to have. Staff are very personable and friendly. Although our hotel was quite a walk to the Pier, we liked the quieter location. Pier is closed for renovations anyway. The hotel's location on the beach was good, not alot of people. Pool is nice. There is no bar (to enjoy tropical drinks during the day), but the daily Happy Hour is excellent. There is a daily continental breakfast-lots of choice for picky eaters. Although there are alot of hotels in the area, many appear to be run down-- Bahama House is very clean, well maintained and the staff are very pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “The perfect place !”
Reviews.Author: jmulcahy
Reviews.Content: The best place in Daytona Beach , Clean ,convenient and on the ocean . So glad we found this place , Jane at the front desk can't do enough for you

Reviews.Title: “Incredible!!!Best place in Daytona!!!!”
Reviews.Author: coyboy
Reviews.Content: This was a moms and daughter trip. We could not ask for anthing more than what we got out of our trip. There were 5 girls 2 moms and 2 daughters and a friend. The place was very clean, and always offered clean fresh towels knowing that there were 5 girls. Happy hour was offered on a daily basis and the younger girls enjoyed Shirley Temples. The oceanfront room was a wonderful place and had a stove and fridge. The pool and hot tub were always clean. The teens felt safe at night due to security, that was very important to us. The beach was clean and we always enjoyed the extra towels offered by the pool. The staff went out of their way to make sure we were well taken care of. I am already planning next years trip and we have added more girls. We will probably never stay anywhere else. This was a very nice family environment.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, no complaints”
Reviews.Author: dk8942
Reviews.Content: Went during tail end of spring break season. No problem with partiers--they were a mile up the beach. This was definitely a great place to stay for the family. Pool was heated, so relatively cool nights not a problem. Right on the beach, walking out the back door of the hotel and you were on the sand. Room was clean, quiet, and great views of the beach and morning sunrise over the ocean. Another reviewer complained of an eyesore boarded up hotel to the south--we could see what they were talking about but didn't diminish our stay a single bit. Staff was very courteous and helpful. If I have any gripes, it would be regarding the complementary breakfast--room is small so finding a place to sit and eat was a challenge. Selection also not appealing to me. However, I am picky about such things and must say that I find the majority of complimentary breakfasts lacking no matter when and where I travel, so I never use this as a criteria in choosing a hotel. So believe me when I say that this is a minor issue and I would stay here again in a heartbeat!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: SherryGran
Reviews.Content: Bahama House is a great place to stay in Daytona Beach, FL. My husband and I took our four grandsons, ages 6-12, to Orlando for several days (theme parks) and stayed at the Bahama House for two nights before we headed home, at which time our daughters and son-in-laws joined us for one night after their cruise. We loved the Bahama House for several reasons: it was right on the beach, had a good pool/hot tub, free WIFI, mini kitchen in rooms with refrigerator/sink/microwave, complimentary breakfast and happy hour (adult drinks for adults and soft drinks and popcorn for kids)and the staff was extremely accomodating. This was our first time staying at the Bahama House, but we would hightly recommend it and definitely would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “great family place”
Reviews.Author: liz097
Reviews.Content: we had a few days break in daytona following our week long blast of disney parks in orlando. what a break to stay in a lovely, family run hotel. the staff were excellent, friendly and helpful. The room was spacious and clean with a lovely partial view of the beach. this hotel was just what we needed after the exhaustion of Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “breathtaking view from balcony”
Reviews.Author: jkr64064
Reviews.Content: we loved our stay at bahama house! beautiful ocean views off of balcony, spacious room, fully equipped, happy hour was great! a few suggestions that would have made this 5 stars for me: upgrade bed linen quality, include extra coffee packets with more creamer, ect in room, add more protein choices at breakfast- yougart, eggs - it was very basic. to no fault of the hotel, people were smoking on their balconies around our room and had to go back inside/ shut the door ect - maybe a no smoking policy for balconies? Would also suggest a bar/ snack shop at this hotel. We had a wonderful, relaxing stay & the view was priceless, thanks!

Reviews.Title: “very peaceful stay!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: tennesseegirl2010
Reviews.Content: I spent two nights at the Bahama House, and was very impressed! The hotel was beautiful, the room was amazing, and the staff was wonderful! They were soooo kind, courteous, and helpful! My room was absolutely beautiful, and my ocean view from the room was gorgeous! I had such an amazing and peaceful trip! I would definitely stay at the Bahama House again! They also have a great happy hour in the evenings!!

Reviews.Title: “Thanks for the great stay!”
Reviews.Author: namretsew
Reviews.Content: Greetings- We realize we live in a world that takes the time to complain. We just wanted to thank you for a great stay. The pool was nice and warm so we could swim on a cool day. The rooms, staff and breakfast were all great. After viewing many hotels on the strip, we will be sure to recommend the Bahama House!

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel - right on the beach”
Reviews.Author: luvs2holiday
Reviews.Content: Nice hotel located right on the beach. This hotel is away from the main spring break area. College spring break was just beginning when we stayed and most of the college party life was up the beach further which made our stay nice and quiet. The weather was cold and rainy but we were still able to enjoy our lanai with a bottle of wine overlooking the ocean. We did not arrive in time for the free cocktails but the free continental breakfast in the morning was very nice. I would definitely stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “A+”
Reviews.Author: harleymanNewHamshire
Reviews.Content: I have been going to the Bahama House once or twice a yr. for about 8yrs. I go for Biketoberfest and Bike wk. I have never been disappointed the staff is always pleasant and helpful. They always try to give me the same oceanfront room. The rooms are always spacious and clean. The location works for me. The pool and hot tub are all I need for amenities. Complementary breakfast is always good. The staff treats me like one of the family.I can not say enough about my stays there. The girls always go out of their way for me. I'll be there in October and I'm looking forward to It. Hope the weather is warmer. John J Slavin

Reviews.Title: “Excellent facility and staff!”
Reviews.Author: kandices
Reviews.Content: We have "staycated" at several hotels on the ocean in Daytona Beach and the Bahama House is most definitely one of the best. The room was very comfortable, the evening cocktail party incredible and even the fresh made cookies available for free at the front desk. The staff was friendly and helpful and the pool and deck and location unparrelled. I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “I'll be back.......”
Reviews.Author: sammytrash
Reviews.Content: Have been to Daytona a number of times and thought I'd try Bahama House for Bike Week 2010. It was an excellent choice and a great stay. The place is really very clean, well maintained, and my oceanview room was beautiful. The underground parking was also very convenient, safe, and it kept my bike out of the weather. No fancy restaurant or bar at Bahama House but who really needs that? When you visit Daytona, why would you want to hang around the hotel? I've stayed at other hotels in Daytona (4 and 5 stars) but this is really a nice place; I'll be back.

Reviews.Title: “Happy---Happy”
Reviews.Author: dandridgewitch
Reviews.Content: Very clean-courteous staff very good overall service

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't Fault A Thing”
Reviews.Author: MikeS02
Reviews.Content: We stayed three nights - Thurs thru Saturday in mid December. Staff were friendly and welcoming. Hotel was clean. Our bedrooms were sea facing, clean and very spacious. Breakfast was continental style and there was plenty available. I am really hard to please but I couldn't find a fault with this hotel. The bottle of water on leaving was a nice touch.

Reviews.Title: “Bahama House Review”
Reviews.Author: andersonfhs
Reviews.Content: Great family hotel! Very clean! Great underground parking! We will certainly be staying there again if and when we go back!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: TheFergie's
Reviews.Content: Great place. Great Location, Great Rooms, Great Views, Friendly & Helpful staff. good breakfast, all this on one of my favorite beach's in the world. Visit Cow Licks up the road, great Ice Creams. I am going back 2010 again, its a lovely hotel

Reviews.Title: “Friendly place to stay right on the beach”
Reviews.Author: sj_nomads
Reviews.Content: Had business in Daytona Beach and the company recommended the Bahama House. Due to a schedule change I requested to check in early which was accomodated with a smile. In the evening they have a nice happy hour once again done with a smile. Upon checking out I was given a bottle of water for the road, a very nice touch.

Reviews.Title: “The most wonderful place on earth”
Reviews.Author: bootsJohnstownPA
Reviews.Content: This was our fourth visit to this hotel. The rooms are clean, neat, and well-kept. The service and staff are amazing. We book a room with the mini kitchen, so we don't have to eat out all the time (there's a grocery store right down the road) and it has everything you need for four people to eat (except the food)! They have happy hour everyday with free drinks for the adults and popcorn, pretzels and beverages for the kids. Friday night while we were there they had a magician! The pool and hottub are outstanding and from there it's just a few steps to the incredible beach! The staff makes you feel like you are there most important guest and that you are part of their family. There is nothing there I don't like, and I hope to stay there many more times in my lifetime!

Reviews.Title: “Third room great view, helpful staff, clean room, and good time.”
Reviews.Author: RichardAugustaGA
Reviews.Content: On second day we got a room with a great view, very clean, and quiet, except when we opened the door to hear the surf; Excellent beach and swimming in the ocean and only used the pool 15 minutes. Staff were friendly and helpful, especially when we were put in a stinking smoker's room at 1230 am after a long trip; I reserved a non-smoker but the staffer stated (two other stfaffers said the same the next 2 days) the owner's policy was not to allow reservations for nonsmoker rooms. We moved to another room the first night but it was not a front ocean view and the balcony was not useable because of a huge, loud exhaust fan just below the balcony. Second day we received the great room we loved and then decided to stay a third day. Underground parking cannot be beat.

Reviews.Title: “Will Definetly go back”
Reviews.Author: shannonmichelle426
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff was extremely helpful and nice (the maid service is quick to clean your room while you are out). The rooms are clean, very well kept, and has comfortable beds. The view of course makes the stay even better (had ocean front room). I would recommend this hotel to anyone and I will be going back.

Reviews.Title: “Highly Recommend this hotel.”
Reviews.Author: jmhMN45
Reviews.Content: The staff where really friendly and the hotel wa really clean. The nicest hotel I've stayed at in a long time.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Clean, Friendly,”
Reviews.Author: loesteve
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at several moderately priced hotels on the beach in Daytona. Bahama House is BY FAR THE BEST. My only complaint. No ice on the floors, however, the staff will bring it to you ASAP, no tip expected. We tipped anyway. Happy hour is great, although no margaritas. Plenty of beer, wine and other hard alcohol. Very friendly with a staff that tries hard to please.

Reviews.Title: “Service was Great”
Reviews.Author: mike_ja60
Reviews.Content: We had a very large suite with 2 queen beds, full kitchen with balcony over looking the ocean and city. They have a good continental breakfast in the morning and free drinks at happy hour in the late afternoon. Everyone was much friendlier than most other hotels. The pool was heated to about 85 degrees.

Reviews.Title: “The Bahama House is a great place to stay on vacation or just passing through”
Reviews.Author: dayt0na
Reviews.Content: Went to Daytona to visit family with mother. The staff was very helpful in accomodating us with rooms, etc. They were extremely friendly! Rooms are very clean and balconies are usable. We went in November and there is not alot of traffic on the beach. Hotel itself seems to run perfectly. Excellent comp breakfast and happy hour! Rooms cleaned perfectly. If you're looking for an affordable, friendly, clean, hotel...don't think twice at staying here. I will definately stay again when visiting! ....Thank you Bahama House!

Reviews.Title: “Best Place Ever!!!”
Reviews.Author: cassie5239
Reviews.Content: My husband and I had the nicest experience at the Bahama House,from the moment we came through the door and until we left a week later. The service was great, the rooms were roomy and very clean. The location is great. If you like to walk on the beach you can walk to numerous restaurants without ever getting into a car. And of course one of my husbands favorite things was the homemade cookies, they were delicious !!!! We will be back again next year,possibly for 2 weeks.

Reviews.Title: “This was an unexpected delight on our month's tour of the U.S.”
Reviews.Author: awolcat
Reviews.Content: We recently completed a month's driving tour of the U.S. leaving Canada at the beginning of October and returning at the end of October. We stayed in many hotels, some were quite dreadful, but the Bahama house was the nicest one by far not the mose expensive . It started with the check in desk which was warm, friendly and very helpful, then we were given our room which was wonderful, bright, clean and so inviting, with a small kitchen attached., the pool and beach areas were really clean and the hospitality room where we were treated to "happy hour" and continental breakfast were delightful. The staff was warm friendly cheerful and always willing to please, we even got a "goody bag" at check in, and bottled water to speed us on our way when we left. All in all this was the nicest stop of our holidays. Ron and Lila Lawcock, Ontario Canada.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly employees, beautiful location, great service”
Reviews.Author: Nashville_TnPinkrose
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have tried several hotels in Daytona Beach. We will definitely be coming back to the Bahama House. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The location was perfect. The entire hotel area (room, lobby, pool area) was clean and in good repair. Even the other guests were warm and friendly. We didn't want to leave but are already planning our next visit.

Reviews.Title: “Best place I have ever stayed in Daytona !!!”
Reviews.Author: msskidoo
Reviews.Content: I traveled to the Bahama House so that I could visit my son at college and still stay at the beach. From the time I walked in the front door until the time I checked out this place has been nothing less than TOP NOTCH !!! The smiling faces and friendliness of all the staff sure made me feel very welcome. The room was so spacious and clean and it was so nice to have a kitchen to do some home cooking for my son and his friends. I couldn't have asked for a better location. Right on the beach and close to everything !! The pool was wonderful and the hot tub was so relaxing after a long day. It was nice to get up in the morning and go downstairs to talk to other guests over a very delicious continental breakfast. I learned that a lot of the people that come here have been coming here for years !! I am going to make sure that I am one of them too. I have told all my friends and family to check this place out. I have already started planning another trip in February.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: OcalaHemi
Reviews.Content: We had a great time at the Bahama House while at Daytona Beach for the Daytona Beach Dream Cruise. Loved that you offered under ground parking. Sure kept the car clean for the car shows in the area! The room was clean, and had a beautiful Ocean view! Once we arrived to our room, we noticed the refridgerator was not working properly. Within 30 minutes, the Bahama House staff had it replaced with a new one! We enjoyed our stay so much, we are already planning another vacation, staying at the Bahama House.

Reviews.Title: “Was happy with Bahama House”
Reviews.Author: Gregstr630
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Bahama House for two nights after four nights in Orlando. We were very happy with our choice as it wasn't too close to the crowds near the pier yet only a few minutes to the OceanWalk area by car. Walking around the Hilton, Ocean Walk Hotel and Ocean Walk shopping area made us appreciate the Bahama House and it's very private feel. We had a free breakfast buffet and drinks in the afternoon. With the expensive Ocean View condo development on one side of the Bahama House and a shut down Treasure Island hotel on the other side the beach was somewhat secluded. The staff was nice and the pool and hot tub were clean. On the down side, they didn't have an ice maker on each floor. You had to have someone get you ice from the kitchen. Or just remember to bring your own ice as you have a full size fridge. Also, no restaurant or bar but knew that coming in. There was nothing much within walking distance if you wanted to walk around during the day or night. Would we stay here again? Probably not just because we like to experience new hotels each time we go to Daytona but this will be one that the others would have to compare to. We stayed at the Plaza Resort and Spa three years ago and liked it too.

Reviews.Title: “What a gorgeous Hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: mabryky
Reviews.Content: We had relatives come to town and they stayed at the Bahama House. What a top notch place! The rooms were beautiful, spacious and clean! The staff was so friendly, my family could not stop talking about them! I don't know why anyone would stay anywhere else! Great views, everything very clean, I could go on and on....It was all good!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Biketoberfest @ it's Best”
Reviews.Author: 1REDHOG
Reviews.Content: Wonderful staff, very clean hotel throughout, and a great happy hour! Underground parking kept the ocean salt spray off my Harley over night. They even set up an area for washing your bike and supplied garden hose, rags, soap and bucket. Only thing missing was the bikini girls to wash it! Maybe next year!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “A charming hotel that caters to their guests.”
Reviews.Author: PennsylvaniaDude
Reviews.Content: We found this hotel through AAA and wasn't sure about the facility however we were extremely satisfied with all they had to offer. Great contientential breakfeast, excellent happy hour. I was up graded to a larger room that was very clean with granite tops in the kitchen and plenty of room to sreatch out. The room was an oceanview that gave us a a great view of the ocean. The staff was very friendly and helpful. I would strongly recommend this place to anyone who is looking for a clean, friendly, hotel with a chance to relax and no hastles with noise or concern about security. Close to the board walk but far enough away to enjoy some peace.

Reviews.Title: “Daytona Shores Best Kept Secret!”
Reviews.Author: Sunlover661
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd time this year we have stayed at The Bahama House. It is always an excellent experience. Cheryl, Sandy,Irene and the rest of the crew are always friendly and helpful. The pool is always spotless, the rooms are just squeeky clean, and it's just an all-around nice place to stay. Keep up the great work!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice!”
Reviews.Author: alicecooper2009
Reviews.Content: King efficency very nice.Staff friendly and helpful.Great view.Worth the price,which wasn't bad.

Reviews.Title: “What more could you ask for !”
Reviews.Author: happy4WI
Reviews.Content: The service was great! The rooms were well maintained and the staff was very friendly. What ever questions we may have had, they were there willing and able to answer them. The location of the Bahama House is fantastic!! It is right on the beach, which you are able to walk up & down on for miles. There is also a nice pool for those who aren't into the sand and surf. We really liked the complimentary continental breakfast every morning, as we are not big breakfast eaters. The also had free cocktails a couple hours every evening which was a great way to unwind and meet some great people! I really can't say enough about the Bahama House. Our son is going to school just 15 minutes from the Bahama House so we will definitely be back!!!!

Reviews.Title: “ROOM WITH A VIEW”
Reviews.Author: Gayle23
Reviews.Content: We spent a wonderful, relaxing few days at the Bahama House. We had an ocean view room and the view was wonderful. Staff, accommodations, service, and cleanliness were all up to par. A big plus was the continental breakfast (above average) and the nightly happy hour bar set up from 5:30 to 6:30. We would definitely like to return.

Reviews.Title: “BEYOND EXPECTIONS”
Reviews.Author: mgressle
Reviews.Content: Our stay was beyond expections. Staff was wonderful and the rooms spotless. Location was perfect right on the beach. No rowdy partygoers. We are planning on going back next year. Loved it!!!! Better than the hotels at Disney World in our book. Gressles Middletown, OH

Reviews.Title: “Looking forward to returning.”
Reviews.Author: POP100
Reviews.Content: I would have rated this hotel a 5 except for the strong smell of cigarette smoke on our (10) floor. When we returned home our cloths smelled like cigarette smoke.

Reviews.Title: “great place!”
Reviews.Author: swimberley
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Bahama House many times over the past maybe 10-12 years and never had a bad time. Great rooms, sevice, atmosphere, location. The staff is always friendly and helpful. Just got back from there this week, only suggestion I have is to spread the contenial breakfast out some, across the back wall, it gets very congested on busy mornings, but the service from the lady in breakfast room is the best, she always has a smile for you each morning. Thank you for great service

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: thetravelers2009
