Reviews.Content: The rooms are spacious clean with a great view! Service was wonderful everyone on the staff was friendly helpful and very curtious. Pool area was very clean pool the pool itself was sparkling clean a steady tempture. The cocktail hour each evening was a plus free cocktails fresh popped corn. Nice touch Bahama house! The contintenal breakfast could use a little work but all in all it was okay. George & Jane Nouhan

Reviews.Title: “What a view of the Ocean”
Reviews.Author: Dolphinduet
Reviews.Content: I stayed for a week and enjoyed the time I spent there. The staff was great I was always greated with a smile no matter where I went. Housekeeping always did a great job. I love that all the rooms have balconys and you can just enjoy the view of the ocean. It is a older hotel but you would not know if they keep it in great shape.

Reviews.Title: “LOVED THIS HOTEL!! COMING BACK FOR SURE!!”
Reviews.Author: luvinchris92800
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very clean and the staff was very friendly and extremely helpful to all our requests and needs. When we arrived we were told that we were updated to the deluxe suite at the same rate. The suite was beyond our expectations. It was very roomy and very clean. We were on the 10th floor so we had a great view from our balcony. Housekeeping did a great job when we needed our room restocked. The only bad thing I have to say about this hotel is that the pool could have used a bit more chemicals. The chlorine level was virtually non-existent. It made the pool a bit cloudy and salty if you happen to accidentally get some in your mouth. My kids really hated that. Also, if you drive a larger vehicle (I drive an HHR) you may prefer to use the parking lot as opposed to the underground parking garage. It's rather small and tight down there but at least they have free parking. Super hotel and great stay. We'll definitely use them again the next time we stay in Daytona Beach!!

Reviews.Title: “Family Reunion at Bahama House!”
Reviews.Author: BFMcLaughlin
Reviews.Content: We held the third annual DeLand family reunion at the Bahama House and once again LOVED IT. We are almost beginning to feel as though the staff is part of the extended family, they are so good to us. They even let us use the meeting area downstairs (usually used for continental breakfast and happy hour) for our family luncheon on Saturday afternoon. This is an outstanding place, and beats the pants off the trashy places just up the road. Great pool/hot tub/deck experience, great views, great prices, great fellow guests. A nice, laid back quiet place to hang out and enjoy the beach. Nothing beats this place in Daytona. We've enjoyed our ocean front rooms for three straight years now. See you next summer!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Well Equiped Room With A Great View.”
Reviews.Author: taxguyjr
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff was very responsive, courteous and helpful

Reviews.Title: “My Favorite Beach Motel”
Reviews.Author: gift_from_the_sea
Reviews.Content: My family has been going to Bahama House for many years. There is a very friendly staff and they are quick to accomadate our needs. The motel has nice decor in the lobby and rooms. Therooms are spacious and comfortable. We also like the abundant continental breakfast and cocktail hour. And who can beat walking out the back door to a great stretch of beach? Thanks Bahama House and staff.

Reviews.Title: “Bahama House is a Gem”
Reviews.Author: ClasseeC
Reviews.Content: We chose this property for a wedding anniversary get-away. We were very pleased with our stay. The rooms were large. The kitchen efficiency was perfect for quick meal prep. Regular sized fridge with icemaker, microwave and cooktop. The lobby and common areas were clean and roomy. The staff was available if you needed anything, but not hovering, which we prefer. The continental breakfast had a nice variety. The balcony and view were spectacular. We never heard noise from the other rooms. Can't wait to return. I think we found a regular escape gem not far from home.

Reviews.Title: “Great service, clean, & convenient!”
Reviews.Author: kline2112
Reviews.Content: Went to Daytona for a "get-a-way" week to decompress. This hotel was ideal! Common areas and room were very clean & dry with no noise from other rooms. Staff was friendly and courteous. Just what we were looking for!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful caring people at the Bahama House.”
Reviews.Author: jlovesc
Reviews.Content: I reciently spent 4 days at the bahama house. Let me just say that my stauy at the Bahama House was nothing short of spectacular. I felt like i was at a family reunion because everyone was so friendly. The staff was more then accommodating for each and every one of my needs. The room was big and featured two beds and a kitchenette with full size fridge and stove top. it was so nice. having two beds was very nice too. We used one bed to sleep in and the other for sexy-time! i felt sorry for the room cleaners who had to clean the sexy time bed! But altogether it was a marvelous stay at the bahama house! The warm fresh cookies everyday was a nice touch as well! Plus the happy house with all you can drink mixed drinks and the magic show was hilarious!!! I must say he was the best most funny magicion i have ever seen. He really made the stay memorable! i Hope the hotel pays him something other then tips he receives. My wife and I will definitely be back to the bahama house!

Reviews.Title: “Magnificient!”
Reviews.Author: gemco1jim
Reviews.Content: I have always come here as a child, and stayed at this hotel. This year I brought back myself, my mom, husband, and daugther. We had a wonderful time at the hotel. They care of you the moment you pull into the parking lot to the end of your stay. I would recommend this hotel to anyone. Mary is the best housekeeper in the entire state of Florida! Sandy is an awesome front desk associate. We will be back again, and again.

Reviews.Title: “The best motel/hotel we have ever stayed in!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: kingfishFranklin
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the BahamaHouse many times on our vacation to Florida-- and this is the BEST - It gets better each time ! We would recommend this motel to anyone --- They always do their best to give us the oceanfront room that we love. We will always return for a wonderful experience at the BahamaHouse!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Older hotel but very friendly staff and great access to the Beach!”
Reviews.Author: RetiredIllinois
Reviews.Content: We rented adjoining rooms for 5 adults, 2 teenagers and 8 year old. This is family owned hotel but well kept and very clean. Free breakfast bar open daily from 6:30am - 9:30am. Found on weekends the breakfast area is quite crowded - we had to stand initially until table opened up. Ask staff person if other accomodations available to sit and eat - said no but later we did find an adjoining room to handle overflows. Might have been a communication problem when first asked. Rooms are fairly quiet - seemed quite clean. Parking is free and covered via an underground parking garage. Would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Corvette25
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful visit. The room was very clean and beds were comfortable. The staff was very nice and helpful. We had a side veiw and it was breathtaking. The ocean is wonderful. The happy hour and breakfast were nice (also cookies in the afternoon). Pool area was small but nice, they have a sundeck below the pool area. Lounge chairs are hard so bring towels to put over them. Great location we will be back in December, wonderful hotel.

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT PLACE TO STAY!!! Could not get any better!”
Reviews.Author: Omnia6
Reviews.Content: I took my parents to this hotel for the there 40th anniversary. I worked for several weeks with Melissa Noe in reservations to make sure everything was ready and just right. When we arrived they had congratulations to them posted on the marquee outside and we were greeted with two gift bags. We had 7 in our party, including two children, and we were ALL very pleased with this hotel. Bahama House is THE place to spend your vacation in Daytona! We had two rooms, they were back to back as Melissa promised and our view of the ocean was spectacular. The breakfast was light and good, and happy hour was another time I really enjoyed. We spent time in the large outdoor pool and hot tub. We also meet some very nice people from Georgia while we were there. Everything was clean and looked new to me. I will have more to post with some of our photos later. I will say that Bahama House is lucky and honored to have a worker as dedicated to guests comfort and wishes as Melissa Noe! My suggestion is call Melissa and work with her to make sure you and your family have the vacation of a lifetime!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay. Friendly Staff!”
Reviews.Author: divecop
Reviews.Content: We were very impressed with the friendly people at Bahama House. From the staff to the guests! The rooms, even though were not brand new, were very clean, comfortable, and convenient to the things we wanted to do on our vacation. Thanks to everyone at Bahama House for a great vacation. We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel away from the crowds, but not the fun”
Reviews.Author: SudburyHappytraveler
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed a Wednesday to Saturday stay, the staff was receptive helpfull and curtious. We asked the desk clerk to recomend a good restaurant for dinner and she was quite helpfull. This Hotel has a daily continental breakfast, and Happy hour every evening from 5:30 to 6:30 feauturing free drinks, fresh poped popcorn, peanuts and pretzels. The Hotel is clean and welcoming, the rooms are spacious, clean, but a bit dated. the suits are well equipted and have all the creature comforts of home. Location , location . location... this hotel is just far enough away from the crowds so that the beach by your hotel is not over crowded,and you don't have to jockey for realastate every morning. Yet it is close enough to the peir that it can be reached in under 30 minutes by foot, and what a view as you walk along the beach time just drifts away. Leave your watch on the night stand and enjoy the time by the ocean.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Nitefly1
Reviews.Content: When we checked in, we were very surprised with the size of the room. The pool was clean and they even had an assortment of pool floats and toys available. The view from the balcony was great and it was nice having the one way glass on the windows. Breakfast and Happy hour were a nice addition. We will definitely consider staying at the Bahama House again.

Reviews.Title: “Bahama House is SPECTACULAR from making reservations all the way through the stay....”
Reviews.Author: nothankyouverymuch9
Reviews.Content: I recently had a chance to stay at the Bahama House and I just wanted you to know what an awesome experience. My daughter had received a gift certificate and allowed me to use it as we were moving and needed to stay “somewhere” until such time that we could move into our home. Here are just a few of the things that I noticed: When I called (up to three times) to determine if there was availability, the young lady I spoke with remembered me each time, offered to check for the best prices and/or best deals. Was kind, sweet, pleasant and very helpful with a variety of information about Bahama House and other information that would be helpful to me. On the final call she booked me into a beautiful room that was perfect for the number of people I had and that we had a balcony, and plenty of room and amenities, like a fridge etc. When we came to check in, it was a late check in – again no problem. We were greeted and shown the way to our room, we were given schedules as to the “breakfast” and “cocktail hour”. Everything – Everything was clean and beautiful. The room was cool and inviting and perfect. They were helpful in getting extra pillows and a roll away that evening upon check in. The attitudes of all the employees were so very friendly and helpful. The housekeeping department for our room were very thorough and very kind about coming back to do our room in the event we were still resting. Then extra blankets we requested were brought up that day and anything else we may have needed. Great attitudes. Everyone!! This was a great place to stay and your employees should be highly praised as each one of them smiled, helped, was very courteous and seemed to enjoy working there. I think I’ll have to be checking in there again. I wish I had everyone’s name – I don’t, they deserve great praise. Just thought you would like to know!! Best Regards, Linda

Reviews.Title: “Won't stay again”
Reviews.Author: Hotel_Guest123_99
Reviews.Content: The hotel was priced the same as "other" expensive resorts, I would not stay again-the hotel parking was insufficient-hotel staff had no amentites and was not "people" friendly. The hall and room smelled of cigarette smoke. The bathroom sink had mold around faucet....the only "good" about the hotel was the balcony.

Reviews.Title: “Very unhappy”
Reviews.Author: robbin88
Reviews.Content: This hotel was very run down the patios was broken and you could see the rebar. The fire alarm was going off. The house keeper pulled it out of the wall and put it in the cabinet. Also the frist thing when we got their I had two rooms, the rooms was to adjoining. The doors was nailed and screwed togather. The front desk thought this was funny.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Friendly, and Many Ammenities!”
Reviews.Author: BrianKeith
Reviews.Content: In a town littered with questionable hotels, the Bahama House is a jewel. The beach front property is beautiful - and with ATV rentals and a snack shop nearby, it's extra nice! We've stayed there several times, and have had spacious, clean rooms. If you can, see about getting a corner room with a beach view - they're huge! Rooms are equipped with fridge, sink, range, and fridge - as well as plates and silverware. So you can save a few extra bucks by dining in if you want. Top restaurants are not within walking distance. The hotel is a good mile from the entertainment district, so you'll want to keep the car handy or have good walking shoes. The staff is very friendly and helpful! They treat you like family - not stuffy like many staffers at fine hotels. Manager's reception every night features complimentary soft or hard drinks! The continental breakfast is adequate, but I'd like to see a waffle bar or something. Word to the wise - Do not lose your room key! They're not easily replaced like key cards - and will cost you $10 if lost. Also, I wish they had a good fitness center. I typically substitute my regular workout with a run on the beach. Overall, the Bahama House a great stop in Daytona Beach!!

Reviews.Title: “We loved the Bahama House and plan to stay there the next time we're in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: joefromcincy1961
Reviews.Content: I researched a lot of places before making reservations at the Bahama House, and I chose it because of all the good reviews it had. Well, they all are true. The place was clean, the staff was extremely friendly and attentive, parking was no problem, the elevators were quick, the room was spacious and clean, the view of the beach and the ocean was beautiful, the pool and the hot tub were clean and of a good size, the happy hour was very nice with a large selection of drinks available including Bahama Mama's, the continental breakfast in the morning was good with ample fare, and all of it was at a very reasonable price. If you found fault with this place you're either a pampered prima donna, or perpetually unhappy.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: gemini18
Reviews.Content: We stayed a whole week at the Bahama House and it was a very nice stay. The kids had a good time and my husband and I relaxed.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay with the kids”
Reviews.Author: scrappingmama
Reviews.Content: From the time we got there until we left our kids had a great time. The hotel had sand toys for the kids to borrow and there were concessions on the beach near the hotel where we were able to rent umbrellas and chairs. We enjoyed some time by the pool too. The kids thought it was really cool that they were able to have their faces painted right there in the hotel. We will definately be staying there again!!

Reviews.Title: “Daytona's best”
Reviews.Author: lakeland9
Reviews.Content: Have stated many times from one nite to four nites. Stayed both before and after the hurricanes. Everything has always been the way we wanted it. What more is there to say!!

Reviews.Title: “A sign of the times”
Reviews.Author: lea_carol
Reviews.Content: This is a simple hotel--generally clean and the staff people are pleasant. It's nothing to write home about though. Times are tough and the beach neighborhood shows it. The hotel tries to compensate for its weaknesses. The front desk staff people are professional and they do little things like have warm, chewy chocolate chip cookies waiting for you as you come and go. They also give you a welcome bag as you check-in, and a bottle of water as you check-out. And a bonus--There's easy and direct access to the lovely beach! Ah, but there is a but... the hotel is not that quiet--e.g., the housekeepers will make noise to get you out of your room so they can make the beds! They'll even notify the front desk staff. I'm not sure what happens if you really just want to stay in your room. The breakfast is so so and the coffee is really BAD. It's better to drive to Publix (in Ormand Beach or Daytona shores) and pick up something from the bakery. The hotel room furniture is dated, but the pillows are soft and comfy. There's a balcony, but don't use it once dusk falls because of the bugs. There were signs posted in the lobby and near the elevators warning people not to open the doors to the room balcony because of the mosquitos and what I call, "No see ems" those nasty biting creatures that swarm all over you before you can do a darn thing. So the balcony is pretty useless unless of course you don't mind being bitten. The hotel is a little skimpy when it comes to the small stuff that may turn into something big (or quite annoying): *one roll of toilet paper. You have to call the front desk staff to get more! *Bad coffee---some of the worst I've ever tasted. You MUST go elsewhere to get a coffee fix and there's no place within walking distance since so many businesses are no longer in business.

Reviews.Title: “Planning a trip to Daytona...check the Bahama House.”
Reviews.Author: derf3rd
Reviews.Content: This was our first stay at the Bahama House and we were very pleased. The rooms were very nice and the oceanfront room we had came with a spectacular view of the Atlantic Ocean. The staff was attentive and very friendly. We really enjoyed the complimentary happy hour in the afternoons. The really nice thing about this hotel is the location. It's not too far from the center of the action but just far enough away so that you don't feel like you're too crowded...for me, the perfect distance.

Reviews.Title: “Love the Hotel!!!!”
Reviews.Author: jhmart
Reviews.Content: Love the pool!! Love the beach!!! The happy hour is so fun. It lets you get to know all of your neighbors!! We knew most of the hotel by the end of the trip. Breakfast was simple but good. The views are very pretty. All room have a great view of the beach! We love this hotel. It was our second visit and we will most likely go back when in Daytona. I wish we would have had the full kitchen like last time. Some rooms only have microwave and dorm room fridge. All in all we love this hotel and would highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME HOTEL, LOVED OUR STAY”
Reviews.Author: iowahawkeye57
Reviews.Content: This is really a gem on the beach! It is clean, the staff friendly, beautiful setting. Plan on staying there every year now that we have found this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel in Daytona Beach”
Reviews.Author: Floridaresident_9
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Bahama House with our daughter and 5 teenage grandchildren for 3 nights. This was our second time to stay at the Bahama House. The staff are extremely friendly and helpful. The hotel is spotlessly clean. The rooms are large and airy. The breakfast buffet was reaaly good. The daily Happy Hour was very enjoyable. The Hotel is on the beach which was what you look for in Daytona, with easy access to the beautiful and clean pool. Our stay was most enjoyable. No rowdiness like you find in some of the other daytona beach hotels. Even our teenage grandchildren enjoyed it.

Reviews.Title: “Money Well Spent!”
Reviews.Author: TMM64
Reviews.Content: Beautiful,clean room. They honor if you rebook at a later date the same price. (unheard of). Very caring , attentive staff members. A special thank you to "Laura" Manager our relationship began the moment we booked. Came from MD to visit friends in Palm Coast and celebrate my 45th birthday. Everything you could want in a place to stay away from home. I have it on good authority that their mattresses are sent out regularly to be cleaned. We enjoyed cooking in our room in our kitchen. (Winn Dixe thanks). Iloved the access to the beach, my husband loved the free happy hour each night. We would return. Also notified all our family and friends .God Bless the staff! Pass on room service/pricey.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: brown3
Reviews.Content: Went to Daytona with a Little League team to watch a Daytona Cubs game. About 7 families stayed at the Bahama House. The staff was wonderful, the rooms clean, and well kept. The location is wonderful. An overall great time with family & friends.

Reviews.Title: “just okay”
Reviews.Author: tanyamullis
Reviews.Content: We had stayed at this hotel last summer (2008) as well, and this stay was just okay. The room seemed much nicer last year. The front desk staff was VERY friendly and helpful !!!! The security staff was NOT !!! (i RECIEVED A RUDE PHONE CALL FROM ONE OF THEM AT MIDNIGHT !!!) Not only did he not apologize for waking me up, he was unbelievably RUDE !!!!!!) other than that the stay was okay.

Reviews.Title: “Truly enjoyed our stay at the Bahama House”
Reviews.Author: jackabob
Reviews.Content: Nice accomodations. Enjoyed the pool, happy hour and continental breakfast. This was our first visit and we will be coming up this fall!

Reviews.Title: “Everything was absolutely wonderful!!!!”
Reviews.Author: AmsGeorgia
Reviews.Content: My husband and I loved staying at the Bahama House. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The location was perfect being on the beach. Our stay was wonderful!!!!

Reviews.Title: “The Bahama House is a great place to stay!!”
Reviews.Author: bentley78
Reviews.Content: We don't live to far from Daytona Beach and wanted to get away for a couple of days and get a room overlooking the ocean, after checking two other hotels nearby that had tremendous prices for an ocean view room we found the Bahama House, it is a great price and a big clean room and we had a great view of the ocean!! The service was wonderful, and extra perks include a cocktail hour, cookies, continental breakfast and a little goody bag!! I definitely recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Great Weekend Getaway”
Reviews.Author: flwalks
Reviews.Content: The Bahama House is at the south end of Daytona Beach about 1 mile from the pier. It was very quiet, which was wonderful! The front desk staff was courteous. The lobby was very clean and modern even though this is an older hotel with 10 floors. The room was updated, clean and large, equipped with microwave, refrigerator, and cook top. Great Balcony with view of the ocean. The free happy hour with snacks made us very happy and the continental breakfast was just enough. Plenty of chairs at the pool and overlooking the ocean. Overall, wonderful value, clean, and very relaxing. The only downside was no bar or restaurant so you had to leave the property.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place”
Reviews.Author: NMC59
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful stay, staff was very friendly and courteous. Very relaxing atmosphere. The view was gorgeous. The lobby was very clean. Our room was very roomy and clean with the exception of the mirrors and television. I think the housekeeper forgot to clean them. Definitely will come again. Perfect R&R, just what the doctor ordered.

Reviews.Title: “I really enjoyed my stay at your hotel!”
Reviews.Author: novagurl72
Reviews.Content: My family and I were absolutely satisfied with everything about this hotel, we would really love stay here again! The service was awesome as well as the location. The employees were very friendly and I would definately recommend to anyone I know staying here.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful realaxing vacation!!!”
Reviews.Author: hulagirl66
Reviews.Content: From the moment of check in it was so inviting and friendly.. Ww had a King size Ovean View room that was Breathtaking! The staff was Great and extremely helpful, the pool was Very Refreshing!! They had a continental breakfast and a very nice cocktail hour. We would go back there in a Heartbeat!!!

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't be better.”
Reviews.Author: dink1935
Reviews.Content: This was my third visit this month(May). We had a wonderful time and they treat us like we are family. It is so close to wonderful places to eat and sights to see. Each morning they give us a great breakfast, just wish they would have the biscuits and gravy they had at one time. After breakfast they bake fresh cookies that are out of this world. Plus, we get a newspaper each day. All of the staff are friendly and would do anything to please you. Try Ocean Deck, Auntcatfishes,and North Turn for some great food.

Reviews.Title: “Great Visit, will stay again”
Reviews.Author: arossthomson
Reviews.Content: We went for week end relaxation and quiet and got more than expected. The service at checkin was very courteous and efficient, as was all of the staff during our stay. The room was large, open and very clean. Continental breakfast had a large variety of food to choose from and was fresh and nicely presented. We missed the cocktail hour , but we are looking forward to this on our next visit. Hotel is on the beach and has beautiful views from all areas. The pool and deck area are well kept and make you feel as if you are on the beach. The garage parking let us enjoy our stay without worry about our vehicle. Will definitely return for another stay.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Vacation”
Reviews.Author: alstuckey32
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed the Ocean Front Rooms overlooking the pool. Happy Hour was a BIG plus for us each evening. We also appreciated the breakfast fare. This was our 5th time at Bahama House and we will be going again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: BareFootInn
Reviews.Content: We have been coming to Daytona for years staying in our time share. When my sister visited from Tacoma Washington I wanted her to see why we continue to go to Daytona year after year. We couldn't get into our place so we booked at Bahama House since I knew it was at a good location on the beach. What a delightful surprize! The staff was so friendly & helpful, the room was attractive and clean, the view was good. The breakfast and cocktail were definately a plus. My sister would like to bring her husband next spring and we just may join them.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay, but not as grand as comments on this site make it seem.”
Reviews.Author: vbdarsh
Reviews.Content: This property is a great place to spend a day or two. The hotel was clean and the person who checked us in, was very friendly. Cocktail hour is fun, although limited variety available. Complimentary breakfast was good, but felt like the staff was staring at me as I made a few trips to the table and back getting bagels for my parents--did not appreciate the scrutiny. Not many guests staying there when we were, so it felt like a "dead zone." The hotel's review on this site were a bit overrated; view was good, service was average; price was a bit high. Overall, good experience.

Reviews.Title: “WHAT A FIND”
Reviews.Author: T-in-Phoenix
Reviews.Content: This was our stay in Daytona Beach and Bahama House was recomended to us and we went with it. From the time we checked into the hotel until we checked out we were pleased. Many of the other guests we met were return visitors and were very helpful with things to do and places to go. The overall helpfullness of everyone reflects the atmosphere of the hotel. This was our first time but we will definately go back again.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Hotel, Outstanding Service, Outstanding Staff”
Reviews.Author: GatlinburgOwner
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located on the beach, with a great pool and sun deck on the ocean. The pool area gets sun all day because of the building orientation. They have underground parking, which is great for keeping the salt mist off of your car so you don't have to go to the car wash each morning. Parking is free. The breakfast it the typical cold cereal-bagel-sweets-with coffee. However the staff keeps the coffee hot and pouring, the area cleans, and has friendly smiles. You can read the free paper left outside of your door each morning while you sip your coffee or go set outside by the ocean. The rooms are large, up to date, and clean. I particularly liked the high-speed wireless Internet that was available in the room, the lobby and the pool area. There was also a modem connection in the room if you didn't have a wireless card. I booked through Expedia and check in was fast, as well as check out. No surprises at either end. The location on South Atlantic is just inside Daytona Beach Shores and is a little removed from the Oceanwalk and pier area, but if you don't want to walk up the beach that far, their is reasonable priced parking connected to Oceanwalk. You can also park free at Sun Splash Park and walk a little way to the pier or Oceanwalk.

Reviews.Title: “This Place Is FABULOUS!!”
Reviews.Author: jcordoba79
Reviews.Content: Be sure to join AAA as their discount pays for the membership on your first stay. This place is clean, convenient, and comfortable. A great continental breakfast, and a free COCKTAIL HOUR! No chinsy drinks here, big rum drinks, name brand beers and jug wines. A very clean, heated pool with a HOT TUB! You won't be sorry you booked here.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Hotel for the Money!”
Reviews.Author: osumicro1981
Reviews.Content: The Bahama House is a great hotel for those of you wanting to save money while at the same time not wanting to sacrifice location. The hotel is located right on the beach on Atlantic Avenue. The outside of the building is very appealing when comparing it to other hotels in the area. There is an underground parking garage with an elevator that takes you up to your floor. There is also outdoor parking, however this is at a premium. On the inside, the hotel is very clean and charming. The staff greet you each morning as you leave the hotel with a complimentary breakfast bar with your standard bagels, donuts, and coffee. In the evenings there is a complimentary happy hour from 5:30 to 6:30pm. There you are served either mixed drinks or beer. Be prepared to leave a tip or feel ashamed. In the room, the bed was very comfortable (for a hotel bed) however the room decor was very outdated and stale. The TV was only 19 inches and very basic. The room did have a kitchen with refrigerator, microwave, and sink. The bathroom was roomy, but the shower was absolutely awful. There was no settings on the shower, only super hot or super cold. The iron also did not work properly spilling water all over my dress pants. The best part of the room is the view from the balcony. We had a oceanfront suite with absolutely beautiful views. The views are definately what you are paying for for these rooms. One downside is that to the immediate south of the hotel is an abandoned hotel called "Treasure Island" or something like that. It is rundown and needs to be demolished. However, directly north is a beautiful building which I don't know whether it is condos or a hotel. Anyway, if I could stay anyway in Daytona Beach, I would probably choose a more expensive place, but for the money, the Bahama House is great. Just remember the saying, "you get what you pay for!"

Reviews.Title: “fantastic”
Reviews.Author: tellGuernsey_UK
Reviews.Content: We booked 24 hours prior to arriving from the UK.The staff are brilliant and made our 13 days with them very special. Nothing was to much trouble and the location right on the beach is a great plus. The free breakfast was only lacking in yoghurt.! Thanks to all the staff for making our holiday so special

Reviews.Title: “Bitten by Bedbugs at the Bahama House”
Reviews.Author: dpearce15
Reviews.Content: I have to start by saying that my wife and I stayed at this hotel in 2008 and had a magnificent time, hence the return to the same place for Spring Break 2009. However, this year we had a much different experience. First off, despite this terrible review the hotel still has the free happy hour, is conveniently oceanside, and the staff is very friendly. As strange as it sounds, if this problem were addressed and my concern handled professionally I would go back to the Bahama House based on the courteous staff and amenities the hotel has to offer. Yet now I don't think this is the case since the GM/Owner Brian Lansberry is refusing to grant our request for a partial refund and is basically saying that our complaint is fictious. Vacation started out just as great as the year before. However, as the week progressed both my wife and I started to find bites on our arms and legs that progressively got worse in size and quantity as our week came to a conclusion. Since we didn't hang out in a "wooded area" or anywhere else other than the beach and pool we had a suspicion we were a victim of by bedbugs. By Friday we were convinced this was not a coincidence and were going to ask for a different room but learned from the bartender/front desk associate that the hotel was "booked to capacity". As a result, we just tried to ignore the obvious since we were only there one more night and didn't know for 100% certain that this was the case. In addition, I also believe we didn't want to ruin our vacation. Since both my wife and I are medical professionals we immediately had a dermatologist look at the bites when returning home. In doing so our fears were confirmed: We had been bitten upwards of 30 times between us by insects. While the doctor left open the possibility that it could have been a variety of culprits, both of us knew these welts/bites came from the mattress closest to the balcony in room 911 of the Bahama House. For our part, both her and I are upset with ourselves for not saying anything during the stay and therefore we felt it appropriate to take "half the blame" in the form of only asking for a 50% refund. Yet we are both not the complaining type and again, we didn't want to damper a vacation we had planned for nearly a year. Also, we don't like to make accusations without some sort of foundation for truth, so we followed up as soon as possible. After confirming we had bites, I immediately contacted Bahama House management the first day I was back home. Yet much to our dismay our complaint about the bedbugs was not taken very seriously by the GM/Owner of the Bahama House, a man by the name of Brian Lansberry. When I did speak to him regarding this matter, he tried to tell me that dogs can sniff bedbugs (one of the apparant "tests" he utilizes), that these insects are visible with the human eye, and took the position that my complaint was inaccurate since his hotel is checked "twice a year by a company named Mitex". Although he did say he would look into the matter, I got the impression he didn't believe what I was saying and was going through the motions, especially when he told me the part about using dogs. He did say that he would have the room inspected and would share the results with me, but I was not born yesterday. What's to stop him from changing the mattress, making up some false report, or doing anything else that would alter the inspection in his favor? What's more, if this gentleman really is the owner I don't think he would admit to having bedbugs since that is a health code issue and by recognizing this he would not only lose the money of providing me a partial refund (again I only ask for half of my money back) but also have to take on the cost to correct the situation. Point being, I know what my wife and I experienced, and I welcome anyone reading my review to look at the pictures I've provided and juxtapose them with bed bug bites that can be found via an Internet search if access to a doctor is not readily available. Also, please refer to a review #101 of this hotel from a past guest who had a very similar experience. Here you will also find a response to the guest's complaint in which the hotel's representative basically dismisses the complaint and suggests that this problem was due to being near "wetlands". Keep in mind that this guest was with the USTA, an organization that has a business relationship with the Bahama House and therefore would only be doing themselves harm by making up a complaint. Bottom line, I would have come back to this hotel and given it a decent review had I not been bitten by bedbugs and my complaint would have been treated appropriately. Being medical professionals my wife and I are extremely blessed financially and would not go out of the way to try and "scam" the Bahama House, especially since we like the hotel so much. However, after trying to be reasonable and approaching management for only a partial refund PRIOR to leaving a negative review, I felt the hotel showed that they really didn't care about their guests or the quality of their establishment. In closing, I have already contacted the Florida Department of Health regarding this matter and plan on following it up as far as possible. If you don't want to be a victim of bedbug bites I suggest you stay clear of the Bahama House, specifically room 911.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Value”
Reviews.Author: Joluc76
Reviews.Content: From the time we checked in, the desk receptionist , Jane's smile and attention to detail set the stage for a great 3 day stay. The ocean front room was very large and imaculately clean. The continental breakfast and happy hour were unexpected pleasures. What more can I say, Great location, Great people and a great value. Jim Lucey

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, relaxing, clean and courtious”
Reviews.Author: hlclimenhaga
Reviews.Content: We stayed there after looking at many other places. The reviews we seen on the Bahama House where very good so we thought we would give it a try. It lived up to all our expectations and then some. There isn't a better place for the money. All they need is more toasting facilities in the morning for bagels. Very nice stay.......Lynn and Howie

Reviews.Title: “Not what it is cracked up to be!!”
Reviews.Author: bch403bum
Reviews.Content: The hotel is OK, the people are very friendly, the continental beakfast is OK the usual bagels, cereal, toast. The happy hour is nice but you will be lucky if you get two trips through the line, there is one attendant and the line is very long. parking was very scarce and they ran out of spots every night we were there. We stayed for 5 nights and on the last night our room smelled like smoke. We have three children and reserved a non-smoking room, when I called downstairs I was told the floor was a smoking floor and they were all out of rooms, there was nothing they could do. Will I stay again? NO, next time I will spend the extra money and stay in a nice hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect family beach hotel”
Reviews.Author: Kyle560
Reviews.Content: Good service and great location, ocean view great, quiet room even during spring break time. Excellent beach access with nice balcony on room.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel for the Money - Great location on the strip and on the beach!”
Reviews.Author: wanderlusting5
Reviews.Content: First let me start by saying that this is not by any means a luxury hotel, it is economical. With that said, it was a great stay within the price range. It was actually, from the exterior, more aesthetically pleasing than almost every hotel on the South Side (known as Daytona Beach Shores) of Daytona. I didn't have high expectations of the hotel due to some reviews and the star rating, so that I wouldn't be disappointed during my stay. The hotel was kept very clean from all my observations (and I'm pretty critical), there was always someone mopping the floors in the lobby or housekeepers on our floor. The lobby was inviting and the staff at check in was very accomidating. We drove to Daytona Beach and arrived at 10:30AM understanding that checkin was at 3PM. Before we spoke to anyone we decided to check our luggage at the front desk, change clothes, and just walk around until checkin. We asked the front desk attendant if we could check our baggage and she actually told us that our room was ready and checked us in early (without any charge). I thought that this spoke highly of the level of hospitality, so I was impressed by this (check one for surpassing my expectations). The rooms were pretty dated, which I expected, but were larger than I had anticipated. We were given an "ocean view" room with two double beds, which I was aware of at booking. The ocean view was just that... a view... lol. We were in the furthest room from the ocean, but did have a good view. And any view of the ocean is better than no view, in my opinion. The bathrooms were VERY tiny, but clean and there was a plethora of hot water for the shower (actually so much so that our shower did not have a "cold" setting and I thought it was great). The location of the hotel on the beach was perfect. It was far enough away from the Boardwalk area that it was not as busy as the rest of the beach on both sides. The beach was very clean. The hotel was only about a mile from the boardwalk/main pier, but there were plenty of places to visit along the way. We walked pretty much everywhere when we were going to be on atlantic avenue. The pool was pretty average and the hot tub was very hot, but we didn't even use either of these until at night (why lay out at a pool when you have the beach???). The hotel offered a complementary breakfast and happy hour. The breakfast was the usual cereal, bagels, coffee, danishes, fruit, juice, oatmeal that you would find anywhere, but the attendant kept up with it and the food was good. We got breakfast every morning before we started our day. Happy Hour was a GREAT idea of the hotel... Free drinks (i.e. mixed drinks with vodka, rum, whiskey and budweiser, bud light, and miller light cans) from 5:30 to 6:30 each evening. This was great and we stopped each night before we went out to dinner or out into town. The staff was very pleasant to us and even helpful in recommending some places to get drinks and dinner. Overall I was pleasantly surprised by the trip. The beds were harder, but comfortable. The hotel was kept clean, but was a little dated. It was a great stay for the money and I would definitely stay here again. Places you NEED to eat at: Drinks: Ocean Deck Aquarium - - This place was AWESOME Dinner: Fresh - Italian Chart House - Steak House/Seafood - Expensive, but SOOOO worth it Big Kahuna - Great appetizers/late night meal

Reviews.Title: “Got out before checking in”
Reviews.Author: wi_beachluv
Reviews.Content: Booked the hotel for its great reviews online. Arrived there at noon. Checkin was at 3:00 PM. The staff rudely informed that they have no place to hold our luggage. After requesting (a lot), they agreed to keep it in lobby and they will keep an eye on it (which they were not). There aren't any eating places around or in hotel, so basically we were sitting on their "deck" that had 1 row of chairs and people smoking. The pool is very small (nothing like in the pictures). Family with kids - BEWARE - this hotel sits on the strip of beach where cars are allowed - so there is traffic on the beach!! Called my vacation vendor and upgraded our hotel to The Plaza Resort and Spa, had to pay small price difference but was a huge upgrade and many,many, many times better than this hotel in ALL respects. I lost my money for one night since it was less than 24 hours - we didn't even want to see what the rooms look like - we just wanted to get out of there!

Reviews.Title: “Very Pleasant Experience”
Reviews.Author: slotdr
Reviews.Content: We chose this hotel from a list of hotels given to us by Embry-Riddle. We were down in Daytona to tour the University. We selected this hotel based on the information and pictures online. The hotel and the rooms are better than the pictures online. Our room was very clean, comfortable and we had a view of the beach and ocean. The staff was very accommodating. The continental breakfast was excellent. We did not get to attend the complimentary cocktail hour. The drive to/from the university is approx. 15 minutes. We will definitely book at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “3rd times a charm”
Reviews.Author: cporter631
Reviews.Content: This was our third trip to the Bahama House. My two teenagers wanted to go on a vacation that nothing was planned. Of course it had to include a trip to Daytonna. As hard as it was for me "not to plan" our 4 days over Christmas were the greatest. The hotel was wonderful and being a single parent, the breakfast helped on the budget. The temperature was 80 degrees except for Christmas day and it was 75 and rainy. Being from MN, 70 and rain was wonderful. The staff was great and as usual the rooms were awesome with a super view of the ocean sunrise every morning. Bahama House is the only place for us!

Reviews.Title: “Very Romantic and Excellent Rates”
Reviews.Author: Amandagage225
Reviews.Content: My husband and I wanted to get away to Daytona Beach, Fl for the weekend and what better place to escape then go to Bahama Hotel. We visited Adventure Island theme park and at night we went to Cocoa Beach. This hotel offer amazing discounted rates for upcoming events. Me and my husband loved biking and we wer able to get a special rate for that.

Reviews.Title: “Homey atmosphere w/friendly staff & people”
Reviews.Author: brubic
Reviews.Content: We are repeat visitors over the last 10 years and BH is our first choice for a hotel on the beach. Warm friendly staff, protected parking, breakfast & nightly cocktail hour are great pluses. We visit our grand kids and have them stay with us and they love the amenities also. My wife & I highly recommend a stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Time at Daytona Bahama House”
Reviews.Author: travelsilva
Reviews.Content: Last summer we stayed at the Daytona Bahama House hotel and it was an amazing experience there. Very clean oceanview colorful designed room and many magical treasures hidden all around the hotel. The breakfast was extremely beautiful and we enjoyed the coctails. Hope to stay there again next time..

Reviews.Title: “Great staff - nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Carlie730
Reviews.Content: The staff was very friendly and helpful with suggestions for restaurents. This is a nice quite hotel, very clean. Cont. Breakfast is sufficient and the happy hour is fun.

Reviews.Title: “Creative advertising”
Reviews.Author: rryan3131
Reviews.Content: After checking their website, I called looking for an oceanfront room with a full kitchen, which the website says they have. Upon arrival, I received an ocean"view" with just a kitchenette. I asked about the oceanfront, since my wife and i were going to be there for 13 nights. I was told that I didn't pay for an oceanfront. Yet I was not offered the rate for an oceanfront. I asked about the full kitchen, lie the website says they have, and was told that they don't have, or never had full kitchens. We were really counting on a full oven, instead of a microwave and just a two burner stove. Next was the in-room safe. When I asked about that, I was told that I could have a key, for $ 1.00 per day. Spare me. Finally, The hotel boasts free wireless internet. Well, the wireless internet has not worked a single day since we've been here. I keep being told that the provider is aware, but they haven't come out o fix the problem. Then I was told to use the hardwire internet. Well, I spent 3 days, and 5 visits from the engineering department before our room would receive internet. I spoke to the General Manager, and he promised a price reduction for all of the problems. I just received my bill for 13 nights......no reduction of any kind. I would NOT recommend this property.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel ever in Florida”
Reviews.Author: janaruma
Reviews.Content: Have stayed at many hotels throughout Florida - both Gulf side and Atlantic, and this is by far the best hotel we've stayed at. Sure we've stayed at some nice condos, but this whole experience was absolutely perfect. Excellent front desk, impecable rooms and all the extras. On top of all that, the price was very reasonable for the exceptional facility. Definitely will go back and stay much longer!!!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: SPFlorida
Reviews.Content: Nice, clean hotel with a very friendly staff. We had a room with a nice balcony and a great view of the beach. Beach access to drive on the beach is right next door. Snacks and drinks at night were simple but appreciated - breakfast was offered but we were unable to make it. Overall a great value.

Reviews.Title: “Bahama House awesome time”
Reviews.Author: chosen57
Reviews.Content: December 24, 2008 Our Bahama House experience was great. Our family had driven to Daytona Beach from Atlanta GA via Indiana, we had a hotel reservation at another location, but after reading the great reviews about the Bahama House we thought we would give it a try, we had an Oceanview Suite, it was just perfect for our family of six, we arrived on Christmas Eve and stayed for three nights. The children loved the exotic bedding the size of the room was remarkable! The hotel was beautifully decorated and clean. We had plenty of space, a kitchenette and spectacular view. Our family was very excited about the location, this was our first experience on this side of the beach. The staff was very courteous and helpful. The children loved the free cookies at the desk. We are already making plans for next year. You will not be sorry about your stay here, it was definately First Class! Thanks Bahama House for going the extra mile to make sure that our family had a great vacation for the Holidays. Overall this was the best hotel we have stayed in while visiting Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “Bahama House Hotel, Daytona Beach Shores”
Reviews.Author: billybak
Reviews.Content: We recently had a four night stay at this hotel. The rate was at a very reasonable price due to the time of year. One of the highlights of this visit was the friendliness of the management and all of the working staff. The hotel was clean and spotless throughout. The morning Continental style breakfast provided the usual fare though there were no hot items. An evening happy hour was given each day with some wine, soft drinks and mixed drinks available. A very popular item at the happy hour was the popcorn machine. Our room was an ocean view one which did provide enough sight and sound of the surf to satisfy us. Our room was one equipped for the handicapped which left us disappointed with the bathroom. There were bars at the side of the bathtub but no bar to assist a person to enter or leave the tub. The major disappointment was the single standing wash basin. There was absolutely no place to put any toilet articles. The bathroom needs some sort of at least a small free standing table shelf or added sink counter. These shortcomings would certainly discourage any long term stays. The bedroom and kitchenette were well furnished and presented no problems. For us there was one thing that travelers should note - this hotel offers no weekly rates. The only break from the daily cost of a room is if you plan to stay a month or more.

Reviews.Title: “Brief stay at the beach”
Reviews.Author: HersheyPAtraveler
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I were looking for a place to enjoy the beach for a few days before going on to Orlando for a big soccer tournament. We chose the Bahama House in part because of the strong ratings on Trip Advisor. The Bahama House not only lived up to its strong ratings, it exceeded them, in our opinion. What stood out was the personal, friendly service of the staff. Add to that the very comfortable, exceptionally clean room with a great view of the ocean, and the result was a wonderfully relaxing, restful stay. If our travels take us back to the Daytona Beach area, we will certainly return to the Bahama House.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Hotel - Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: kja63
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful experience at the Bahama House. Great location on the South end of Daytona Beach. Easy check-in. Staff was helpful and friendly. Our room was very large. Full kitchen, with refrigerator/freezer, microwave, 2 burners, dishes, silverware, glasses, etc... We had 2 king size beds that were moderately comfortable -- a bit too soft for our liking. Balcony overlooked the beach and ocean -- gorgeous! They have a continental breakfast every morning, with bagels, toast, muffins, danish, OJ, coffee, etc.. They have a happy hour every evening with beer, wine & mixed drinks. No restaurant on site. The pool is a nice size and there's a hot tub. Easy access right onto the beach. Great off-season price of $89 per night. We loved this place.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous”
Reviews.Author: kklucy
Reviews.Content: The reviews on TA are correct - This is a beautiful hotel, great location, wonderful staff - The happy hour was a nice plus Would definately stay there again - only down side is there are no ice machines - you have to contact the front desk and they will deliver it to you

Reviews.Title: “Awesome place to stay.....”
Reviews.Author: rachdkoshinski
Reviews.Content: This was a great place to stay. We had a room with an ocean view. Absoulutely beautiful. The place was clean and the staff were very nice. It was so great we are planning to spend a whole week there next June. For sure recommended!

Reviews.Title: “Feels like home!”
Reviews.Author: pbriang
Reviews.Content: Once again, we returned to the Bahama House for our annual November Golf Getaway. As usual, the staff was very friendly and accomodating. Everything was as expected. It was so nice to see so many of the faces that we have come to expect seeing. People like Linda, Jane, BJ, and Sydney. It feels like we're visiting family. The rooms are neat and tidy and the ocean views are fantastic. It is so nice to be able to rise early, take a walk on the beach and watch the sun rise majestically over the horizon. It is truly breathtaking. The breakfast area is set up early and we were always greeted with Linda's charming welcome smile. After a day on the course, it is always nice to unwind and recall the day's memorable moments (and not so memorable ones as well) during cocktail hour. Now, too quickly, our trip has ended and we are now at home in Wisconsin, preparing to brave another winter. But with the memories of having enjoyed another great trip and the knowledge that we will return again next November, the winter will pass more quickly.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay on the Beach at Bahama House”
Reviews.Author: carl44
Reviews.Content: The Bahama house is a great hotel to stay at with clean rooms and very good beds and pillows and ocean view. The staff is friendly and will do anything to please so you will come back next year. We feel at home here. Happy hour every day to relax was very well received by our golf outing members. Continental breakfast was also good. I would gladly stay there again in the future. Carl Should add an exercise room with simple equipment like stair climber and treadmill. Pool and hot tub well maintained and fun.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly well run and excellent service by all.”
Reviews.Author: harold30
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a trip to Florida, and stayed at the Bahama House for 4 nights. From the moment we checked in until we left, every person we had contact with was great.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!”
Reviews.Author: samrudy
Reviews.Content: This place is great. The room was spacious and clean. Beds were acceptable. Pullout left a little to be desired. Pillows need work. Overall - our stay was wonderful. Had a great oceanfront view. Have already recommended to others and would definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “The Bahama House is great.... except one thing”
Reviews.Author: JillieNKev
Reviews.Content: We stayed 8 nights at the Bahama House. It truly is a lovely hotel with a relaxing, welcoming atmosphere. The free breakfast was more than adequate and the complimentary Happy Hour was fun for both adults and kids. Our room was an oceanfront efficiency which offered a direct view of the Atlantic, the beach, and the pool. It was incredible. We never heard a peep from our neighbors' rooms nor did we ever hear people in the hallway. The underground garage offers safe parking. The "except one thing" in the title is an important one thing. The beds were horrific on the back. For the life of me, I can't figure out what, exactly, was the problem with the beds. They didn't seem overly firm and even seemed comfortable for the first hour. With each passing click of the clock, the bed seemed to fire upon every muscle and nerve ending in my back requiring waking each hour for a deliberate position change in order to alleviate the pain. We both had diffiulty standing upright for the first morning hour. The good news is, the pain subsided with a hot shower or a soak in the hot tub by the pool (very nice, by the way). I can just say that I felt tortured during the night so it's been a challenge to fully endorse the Bahama House. I would hesitate to return but truth be told, it's probably not entirely different than most hotels in this price range. It is a quandary... such a beautiful atmosphere, cleanliness, and incredible hospitality vs. uncomfortable sleep. I don't know the answer about whether or not to recommend. I did ask a couple of other guests and they agreed that they were experiencing the same issue with the bed so decided against discussing this with the management or maybe asking for a room swap. All that said, I guess the truth lies in the fact that many guests return, trip after trip. One family has been to the Bahama House so many times, they can outline the individual room's advantages and disadvantages by heart. They said that room 1001 is *the* best. We had a blast in Daytona and do plan to return as often as possible (just one minor reason that our economy needs to hold on so that you and I can continue to afford the luxury of travel). We recommend Merritt Island Wildlife Refuge if you're seeking an opportunity to see manatees in the wild (no charge). We took a cruise on St. Johns and a cruise off Inlet Harbor, both were fun, but we didn't spot a manatee. The service workers in Daytona know how to please vacationers and it seemed that everyone enjoyed their work and were super friendly. In a nut, they are all doing their job and realize that hospitality is the key to bringing visitors back. Because one waitress (Ryan) at Aunt Catfish's was exceptional, we returned three times and dropped a couple hundred bucks. We really enjoyed the food there as well, but she truly made us feel at home. Daytona Beach offers sun, fun, relaxation, escape, water, nature (so loved the pelicans and other birds who passed the Bahama House each day), and entertainment (International Speedway), and hospitality all in one place. We truly appreciated the opportunity to vacation here.

Reviews.Title: “A perfect vacation!”
Reviews.Author: Tomspud
Reviews.Content: I've been going to Daytona since 1988 and this is the fifth different hotel that I've stayed at, and The Bahama House is definitely the nicest! I called back in July for a reservation noting that I was an AAA member, and was given an AAA rate of $120 for an oceanfront efficiency. About a month later, I was on their web site and saw a rate of $115 for the same type room for AAA members, so I called the hotel and asked about the rate, and they gave me a rate of $111, NO QUESTIONS ASKED!. After reading the revews on the site and the nice treatment I received on the phone, I knew that I didn't need to shop any further. When I arrived, I saw that all the reviews on this site were right on-the property is well kept, the staff was very friendly,the room was large and very nice, and the amenities were first rate. The pool area was beautiful, and there was a row of chairs on a second level facing the ocean-a great idea. No matter what time we went out for the day, early or late, the houskeeping staff had our room made up when we returned. The daily breakfast was sufficient, and the nightly(not weekly like other hotels) was awesome. My dad and I were tiring the area since we couldn't find the right hotel, but we found one this time and will be returning to the Bahama House on a regular basis!

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: tld8655
Reviews.Content: We just returned from Daytona Beach staying at the Bahama House. We walked in without a reservation due to being dissatified with where we were going to stay. From the time we walked in we were won over. Cheryl took time to show us two different rooms. The whole hotel was spotless. Our housekeeping person, Mary did an excellent job. She was a bundle of joy every morning when we walked out of our room. We enjoyed the morning breakfast and the cocktail hour. We were definitely pamper for the whole week.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel, great view, great service!”
Reviews.Author: sdm23669
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Bahama House in Daytona Beach, FL was a pleasant suprise. Some of the hotels in Daytona have become run-down looking, and many of them look on the verge of being vacant all together, but not the Bahama House. The hotel lobby was gorgeous, very open and inviting, clean, and cheerful. The front desk woman was friendly and accomodating. Our room, which was facing the ocean, was large, clean and even had a mini kitchenette. Their pool was right by the ocean so if we didn't want to deal with the sand we still had a great view of the beach and the ocean. At night they had free drinks and popcorn in the lobby area. The breakfast in the morning was the normal continental breakfast of cereals and pastries, but it was fresh and readily available. Check out was simple and quick and they even gave us a free bottle of water as a thank you gift! We would definitely stay there again if we were in Daytona Beach again!

Reviews.Title: “LOVED THE EXPERIENCE!!”
Reviews.Author: Ladybugg88
Reviews.Content: Where do I even start. This place was amazing! The entire staff was more than customer friendly. We really enjoyed the free breakfast every morning, the free popcorn & cookies & how could I forget the free happy hour!!! We had the best time & deffinately want to visit again soon. The place is beautiful & sits right smack on the beach. The rooms were very nice & clean plus our ocean view was breathtaking. The Bahama House provided my 2 yr old son a bucket & shovel & even gave me an arrival bag full of goodies. I really can not say enough good things about the Bahama House. We are so glad we stayed there & thanks to my place of employment I received an email & took them up on the offer. Anyone thinking of visiting Daytona Beach should deffinately check out the Bahama House. You will be glad you did! Thank you Bahama House for giving my family a wonderful getaway in such a great place to hang out. We can't wait to visit again! Starfish & seashells, The Brokaws from Polk Co Fla

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay and vacation at the Bahama House”
Reviews.Author: torontogman
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at the Bahama House in August 2008. This was our 2nd time there and the staff and room was great. The hotel met our needs with a beachfront view that was very clean and spacious. The hotel was clean and the staff is very fiendly and helpful and address any needs. The breakfeast and Happy Hour and to the enjoyment. The pool is nice and once past the pool your on the beach. We will consider Bahama House as our 1st choice any time we return to Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Beach Vacation”
Reviews.Author: caroldh4
Reviews.Content: We stayed for three nights at the Bahama House to celebrate our anniversary and I can honestly say it was the most enjoyable hotel stay we've ever had. Our room was very spacious and had a fully furnished kitchen which we barely used but enjoyed having it none the less. The only thing that went wrong was our coffee pot acted up the first morning and it was promptly replaced within five minutes. Our room was clean and the towels were the soft plush ones, not the usual non-absorbant cardboard type. We had a beautiful panoramic view of the beach and we spent much of our time out on the balcony. The beach was very quiet. Your newspaper is delivered to your door in the morning so you can enjoy coffee and newspaper out on the balcony. This is a family oriented establishment and we would not hesitate to stay here again on our next visit to Daytona. Thank you, Bahama House, for making our anniversary so special.

Reviews.Title: “Love the Bahama House!”
Reviews.Author: nomadicgal
Reviews.Content: Wonderful location - right on the beach. Every room had a wonderful view. Helpful staff. Clean - and I am a clean freak! I came down to visit with my best friend. This was a perfect getaway. They upgraded us to a king size bed room, which was great! Roomy and had large bathroom and kitchen area. Staying here made our visit so enjoyable and relaxing. My husband and I came and stayed here initially in Oct. 07. Great experience then. We even got to rescue a few baby Loggerhead turtles that washed into shore - a once in a lifetime experience! We will stay again when in the area. Nice extra is the happy hour and continental breakfast. There is a umbrella/lounge vendor by this hotel, which made our time on the beach very comfortable. The staff is so nice. For instance, we still wanted to go to the beach after we checked out and they had no problems with us coming back and changing in the lobby bathrooms - which were very clean. They also will allow the hot tub and pool to be used late as long as you are not disturbing guests - for us northerners, there is nothing like sitting in a hot tub staring up at the stars through palm trees :) Love this place.

Reviews.Title: “One of THE BEST VACATIONS!!!!”
Reviews.Author: tbirdmomma
Reviews.Content: I travel a lot and this was , without a doubt , one of the nicest vacations I have had!!! I went with my daughter , 14 yr old granddaughter and her friend and we had a blast!! The hotel is exceptionally clean (they are constantly seen cleaning) and comfortable and the staff were all very , very nice! Our oceanview room was wonderful and the view was GREAT!! Happy Hour was a very nice bonus , as was the continental breakfast. The beds were VERY comfortable (but I am glad we took our own pillows) and everything was just perfect for our entire week. You couldn't ask for nicer people or a cleaner place. Sara , in housekeeping , was just great. I am a very picky person , so I was nervous about a previous review , but since that was an exception......almost every single review (and I read them all!) was really good , I chose Bahama House from about 15 others and I am sure glad I did!! Don't let 1 or 2 "questionable" reviews throw you....this hotel is GREAT!!!!! Thank You to the staff of Bahama House. You made our vacation terrific!!!! We look forward to seeing you all again.

Reviews.Title: “Love to stay there”
Reviews.Author: FloridaBeachlady
Reviews.Content: For the past five years, my daughter, my two teen age grand daughters and I spend an extended weekend at the Bahama House before the school year starts again. We love the cleanliness, friendliness, location, complimentary breakfast and cocktail hour, and the location on the world's most beautiful beach. The staff is always cheerful and very helpful. We highly recommend this facility to our other family members and friends.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, Great People”
Reviews.Author: Arlo056
Reviews.Content: The hotel was nicer than the website showed. The room was huge and supplied with refrigerator, stove, microwave, and all else to eat in with. Receptionists were great, the beach was fine, and the price was reasonable. All in all a very nice place to see daytona from and get some good beach time. Will not look further next time we visit the area.

Reviews.Title: “personnel and ameniities”
Reviews.Author: meagreek
Reviews.Content: we visit this hotel each summer for a family reunion for the past 8 years. the location of the hotel is perfect. on the beach with swimming pool. the rooms are always clean and very accomodating. the hotel personnel are always cheerful and the morning breakfasts and evening cocktail hours are also the greatest. towels are readily available for pool use. making our yearly reservations for a wide spread family reunion is always easily and efficiently accomodating. we plan to continue our yearly reunions with great anticipation.

Reviews.Title: “Staff, a great welcome”
Reviews.Author: Richard W
Reviews.Content: Great location on the beach, updated room over looking the ocean. Happy hour was super, enjoyed the magic show. Celebrating our Wedding Anniversery great place to stay Will certainly stay again soon.

Reviews.Title: “We LOVE the Bahama House!!”
Reviews.Author: cornellmom4
Reviews.Content: We go to Bahama House every year. This is a great place for families to stay. The staff at Bahama House is awesome! They treat you with kindness and respect and we see the same employee's every year. The rooms are clean and the lobby is beautiful and very well kept. Another plus is you get a great breakfast included! We will continue to go back every summer!

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: Sunny_Dayz_8
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Bahama House in August 2007 for 2 nights. We originally had booked for 1 night but then when we got there it was so amazing, we decided to stay longer. Heart stopping view of the ocean. Very clean rooms. Excellent service. Breakfast is included and there is a cocktail hour every day, with a free drink for everyone and popcorn too. It is very hard to find a decent hotel in Daytona and Bahama House makes it easy for everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place”
Reviews.Author: gd500
Reviews.Content: This was our first stay at the Bahama House. It is a nice, clean property with an exceptionally spotless lobby area. The lobby and elevators are kept clean, even with heavy beach to room traffic. The room was clean and without the typical mildew found in many bathrooms. The beds were pretty comfortable and the roll-away bed was an actual comfortable twin size mattress and foundation on a rolling frame! Nice. One small gripe is lack of access to the bathroom under-sink cabinet(s) for personal toiletry storage, but the counter area was big enough to accommodate lots of clutter. We were booked in an ocean view efficiency but were upped to an ocean front at check-in for no additional cost, most likely because it was simply available. The staff was friendly with no rudeness or bad attitude. The continental breakfast is no frills and decent. Overall, it was a very enjoyable stay. I would go back again in a second!

Reviews.Title: “WOW - A little piece of heaven!”
Reviews.Author: lj111970
Reviews.Content: What can I say about Bahama House except try it for yourself. We booked after extensive research and reading many reviews. The front desk staff were the best I have ever met. SO friendly and helpfull! The hotel is beautiful and comfortable. The rooms are large and clean - very comfy. We stayed in 1003 with an Ocean front view and let me tell you it was stunning! Housekeeping was so pleasant and did a wonderful job. The pool was clean and warm and the kids loved it! The beach is right past the pool and was terrific. The hotel loaned out pool towels and beach toys - which came in handy while collecting shells. The breakfast was limited but hit the spot first thing in the morning. Cocktail hour was great! The kids and I looked forward to it each day. It was great to receive the newspaper daily and the coupons down in the lobby were great for sight seeing! My 13 year old son, 10 year old daughter and myself never wanted to leave. I miss it even now! It is close enough to the entertainment but not right on top of it. Incredible - after driving for 24 hours the Bahama House was the best little piece of heaven we could have ever asked for - thank you SO much! We will be back~ ps - About the adult store and tatoo parlour accross the street - they aren't that bad and are comparable to other things in Daytona. They blend right in and don't take a thing from the hotel's rating. Actually none of us really noticed them until we were leaving.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable stay”
Reviews.Author: 4 Joyful Travel
Reviews.Content: This hotel is right on the beach. We stayed just one night and were given a free upgrade to an "ocean front" room. This means that the room faces the beach. We had reserved an "ocean view" room, which we think means a view of the ocean from the side. It was a large room with modern decor, a kitchenette, and a balcony. I enjoyed sitting on the balcony at night listening to the ocean. Even with the balcony door closed we could hear the ocean waves all night--very soothing. The beds were comfortable, but the pillows were mushy. The bathroom was small but very clean, and the showerhead was excellent. You must drive to find a selection of restaurants. The continental breakfast was decent but not great, including cereal, oatmeal, fruit, and rolls. Overall it was a nice place to stay and walk on the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Hmmmm......”
Reviews.Author: DaniellesTravels
Reviews.Content: After reading all of the wonderful reviews, I was super excited to stay in the Bahama House. We had booked three nights, starting on a Saturday. We called the hotel to tell them that we would need a late check-in, since we were running late. The hotel told us sure, no problem, they had noted it on the computer. When we arrived, they told us that our reservations had been cancelled, because they didn't think that we were showing up. We told them that we called to arrive a late check-in and who we spoke to (who conveniently had left for the day), but the girl at the front desk told us that that they had no vacancies and there was nothing that she could do about it. She told us that we would have to find another hotel for Saturday night and we could check-in on Sunday. I was furious. I asked her "where are we supposed to go"? After about 2 hours standing in front of her, she finally was able to book us a room at the Best Western Aku Tiki down the street (much better hotel) and we would have to check-out of the Best Western and check back into the Bahama House on Sunday. She guaranteed our room would be ready by 3pm the next day. Well, we went back at 3pm, the room was not ready, the girl we spoke to previously was not working, and the woman working the front desk said she had no idea when it would be ready, so we had to sit in the lobby and wait. We waited over 1 hour. We finally got in the room. It was dirty. There was a lot of mold and mildew in the shower (to the point where it smelled really bad) and the toilet had black mold all in it. Yuck. I personally would not stay here again, I think a lot of the people like this place because it has a full size fridge. The Best Western we stayed at has a half fridge and was cheaper. I would rather have the half fridge then all of the problems.

Reviews.Title: “The staff works overtime to make sure you have a great visit.”
Reviews.Author: cookie1002
Reviews.Content: If you are staying at Daytona Beach amble down from the Boardwalk area and stay at the Bahama House. The rooms are big and clean. But it's the staff that makes the trip worth it. They work overtime to make sure your stay is the best. With a lot of people coming and going from the beach and pool there is always a lot of towels laying around. There was always someone picking them up to keep it neat and tidy. They have an open bar hour each night and it was delightful to get a "bahama mama "and drink it while sitting in the pool. My only complaint is that they still have smoking floors. Our hallway was smoky smelling but not our room. When I talked to the front desk they told me that the hotel was going to no smoking soon. But I would ask for a non smoking floor.

Reviews.Title: “Not what i thought.........”
Reviews.Author: WNB95
Reviews.Content: Well after reading the wonderful reviews on the many previous pages, i thought it was a perfect! I had never visited Daytona Beach before and after staying at the hotel and roaming around the town i have to stay i will probably never go back! When we reserved our hotel threw expedia we had put in a request for a full kitchen (for one room) and a for both rooms to be side-by-side. However, when we got there they did not have the rooms together , in fact on a different floor! I travled with my family and wasn't very comftrable with my kids 3 floors above me! Plus the sheets were itchy and frankly smelled like piss. Also BEWARE when you ask for oceanfront they will give you the complete oppiosite! Also the cleaning staff is very unfriendly! They do not do a good job and also talk behind everyones back in russian...... The town was very empty! Compared to myrtle,miami,st,pete,and virginia beach, Theres only one mall (reall small!) a waterpark and one outdoor boardwalk shopps its a nice quiet area but still felt werid. The beaches had dead white jellyfish that had washed up from a rainy day . I was worried if some of them were alive but luckly the majority was dead. Over all im never coming back!!!! I would not recommend it!

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC PLACE!”
Reviews.Author: YaYa3Pierson
Reviews.Content: We have a yearly reunion of sisters and come to the Bahama House. If you can come and stay for a week, or even a few days, you will not regret it. I don't know how they have and keep such an excellent staff, but everyone there is so nice. They have a Happy Hour every night and on Fridays have a magician, who is a lot of fun. The hotel is clean and well kept and you feel like home when you're there!

Reviews.Title: “What can I say......speechless!!!!”
Reviews.Author: rup232
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Bahama House on June 28-30 based upon the reviews on this website. My wife, 5yr old daughter, and in-laws stayed here after a long week in Orlando where we stayed at Hilton Grand Vacations Club at SeaWorld. We came to Daytona just to unwind from a long week and really relax on the beach. What can I say? The reviews were right on point, very nice and clean, very friendly staff and nice spot on the beach. I just wanted to write and let the hotel know my father-in-law actually liked this hotel better than the 5-star, Hilton Grand Vacations Club at Seaworld. That really says alot!!
